===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/actions/complaint.py =====
from __future__ import annotations

import json
import sys

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Ê™îÊ°à‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºösrc/actions/complaint.py
# Ê®°ÁµÑÁî®ÈÄîÔºöËôïÁêÜÊäïË®¥ÔºõË®àÁÆóÂö¥ÈáçÂ∫¶‰∏¶Ëº∏Âá∫ SLA_eta / priority / next_step
import uuid
from typing import Any

ACTION_NAME = "complaint"

HIGH_KW = [
    "ÁÑ°Ê≥ï‰ΩøÁî®",
    "Á≥ªÁµ±Áï∂Ê©ü",
    "down",
    "Ë≥áÊñôÂ§ñÊ¥©",
    "Ë≥áÂÆâ",
    "ÈÅïÊ≥ï",
    "Ë©êÈ®ô",
    "Âö¥Èáç",
    "ÂÅúÊ©ü",
    "Â¥©ÊΩ∞",
    "ÁÅΩÈõ£",
    "ÈÄÄÊ¨æÂ§±Êïó",
    "Â®ÅËÑÖ",
    "‰∏ªÁÆ°Ê©üÈóú",
]
MED_KW = ["ÈåØË™§", "bug", "Âª∂ÈÅ≤", "ÊÖ¢", "Áï∞Â∏∏", "ÂïèÈ°å", "‰∏çÁ©©", "Â§±Êïó"]
LOW_KW = ["Âª∫Ë≠∞", "Â∏åÊúõ", "ÊîπÂñÑ", "ÂõûÈ•ã", "Ë©¢Âïè"]


def _severity(text: str) -> str:
    t = text.lower()
    if any(k.lower() in t for k in HIGH_KW):
        return "high"
    if any(k.lower() in t for k in MED_KW):
        return "med"
    return "low"


def _sla_priority(severity: str) -> tuple[str, str]:
    if severity == "high":
        return ("4h", "P1")
    if severity == "med":
        return ("1d", "P2")
    return ("3d", "P3")


def execute(request: dict[str, Any], context: dict[str, Any] | None = None) -> dict[str, Any]:
    subject = str(request.get("subject") or "")
    body = str(request.get("body") or "")
    sev = _severity(subject + "\n" + body)
    sla, pri = _sla_priority(sev)
    req_id = (request.get("meta") or {}).get("request_id") or uuid.uuid4().hex[:12]

    meta = dict(request.get("meta") or {})
    meta.update(
        {
            "severity": sev,
            "SLA_eta": sla,
            "priority": pri,
            "request_id": req_id,
            "next_step": "Âª∫Á´ãÂ∑•ÂñÆ‰∏¶ÈÄöÁü•Ë≤†Ë≤¨Á™óÂè£",
        }
    )

    return {
        "action_name": ACTION_NAME,
        "subject": "[Ëá™ÂãïÂõûË¶Ü] ÂÆ¢Ë®¥Â∑≤ÂèóÁêÜ",
        "body": f"ÊàëÂÄëÂ∑≤Êî∂Âà∞ÊÇ®ÁöÑÂèçÊò†‰∏¶Âª∫Á´ãËôïÁêÜÊµÅÁ®ã„ÄÇÂö¥ÈáçÂ∫¶Ôºö{sev}ÔºåÂÑ™ÂÖàÁ¥öÔºö{pri}ÔºåSLAÔºö{sla}",
        "attachments": request.get("attachments") or [],
        "meta": meta,
    }


handle = execute
run = execute

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import json
    import sys

    payload = json.loads(sys.stdin.read() or "{}")
    print(json.dumps(execute(payload), ensure_ascii=False))


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/actions/sales_inquiry.py =====
from __future__ import annotations

import json

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Ê™îÊ°à‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºösrc/actions/sales_inquiry.py
# Ê®°ÁµÑÁî®ÈÄîÔºöËôïÁêÜÂïÜÂãôË©¢ÂïèÔºõÊäΩÂèñÈóúÈçµÊ¨Ñ‰Ωç‰∏¶‰ª•Ê®°ÊùøÁî¢Âá∫ÈúÄÊ±ÇÂΩôÊï¥ .md ÈôÑ‰ª∂ÔºõË£úÂÖÖ meta.next_step
import re
import sys
import uuid
from datetime import datetime
from pathlib import Path
from typing import Any

try:
    from jinja2 import Environment, FileSystemLoader, select_autoescape
except Exception:
    Environment = None  # type: ignore

ACTION_NAME = "sales_inquiry"


def _ensure_dir(p: Path) -> None:
    p.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)


def _load_template_env() -> Environment | None:
    """
    ÂòóË©¶Âæû templates/ Ëàá src/templates/ Âª∫Á´ã Jinja2 Áí∞Â¢É
    """
    if Environment is None:
        return None
    search_paths: list[str] = []
    for d in ("templates", "src/templates"):
        if Path(d).is_dir():
            search_paths.append(d)
    if not search_paths:
        return None
    return Environment(
        loader=FileSystemLoader(search_paths),
        autoescape=select_autoescape(enabled_extensions=("j2", "html", "md")),
        enable_async=False,
    )


# Ë¶èÂâáÂºèÊäΩÂèñÔºöÂÖ¨Âè∏„ÄÅÊï∏Èáè„ÄÅÊà™Ê≠¢„ÄÅÈ†êÁÆó„ÄÅÈóúÈçµË©û
RE_COMPANY = re.compile(
    r"([A-Za-z\u4e00-\u9fa5][\w\u4e00-\u9fa5ÔºÜ&\.-]{1,30})(?:ËÇ°‰ªΩÊúâÈôêÂÖ¨Âè∏|ÊúâÈôêÂÖ¨Âè∏|ÂÖ¨Âè∏)", re.I
)
RE_QUANTITY = re.compile(r"(\d{1,6})\s*(Âè∞|‰ª∂|ÂÄã|Â•ó|pcs?)", re.I)
RE_BUDGET = re.compile(r"(?:NTD?|Êñ∞Âè∞Âπ£|\$)\s*([0-9][0-9,]{0,12})(?:\s*(Ëê¨|ÂçÉ|ÂÖÉ|dollars?))?", re.I)
RE_DATE1 = re.compile(r"(\d{4})[-/](\d{1,2})[-/](\d{1,2})")  # YYYY-MM-DD
RE_DATE2 = re.compile(r"(\d{1,2})[Êúà/](\d{1,2})[Êó•]?", re.I)  # MÊúàDÊó• or M/D
RE_KEYWORDS = re.compile(r"[A-Za-z\u4e00-\u9fa5]{2,15}")

COMMON_STOP = {
    "ÊàëÂÄë",
    "‰Ω†Â•Ω",
    "ÊÇ®Â•Ω",
    "Ë¨ùË¨ù",
    "Ë´ãÂïè",
    "ÂçîÂä©",
    "ÈúÄË¶Å",
    "Â∏åÊúõ",
    "ËÅØÁπ´",
    "ÂÆâÊéí",
    "Â†±ÂÉπ",
    "ÈúÄÊ±Ç",
    "Ë¶èÊ†º",
    "Êèê‰æõ",
}


def _extract_fields(subject: str, body: str, sender: str | None) -> dict[str, Any]:
    text = f"{subject}\n{body}"
    company = None
    m = RE_COMPANY.search(text)
    if m:
        company = m.group(0)

    quantity = None
    m = RE_QUANTITY.search(text)
    if m:
        quantity = f"{m.group(1)}{m.group(2)}"

    budget = None
    m = RE_BUDGET.search(text)
    if m:
        money = m.group(1).replace(",", "")
        unit = m.group(2) or "ÂÖÉ"
        budget = f"{money}{unit}"

    deadline = None
    m = RE_DATE1.search(text)
    if m:
        yyyy, mm, dd = m.groups()
        deadline = f"{yyyy}-{int(mm):02d}-{int(dd):02d}"
    else:
        m = RE_DATE2.search(text)
        if m:
            # ‰ª•Áï∂Âπ¥Ë£úÈΩä
            year = datetime.now().year
            mm, dd = m.groups()
            deadline = f"{year}-{int(mm):02d}-{int(dd):02d}"

    kw_raw = [w for w in RE_KEYWORDS.findall(text) if w not in COMMON_STOP]
    keywords = []
    seen = set()
    for w in kw_raw:
        if w.lower() in seen:
            continue
        seen.add(w.lower())
        keywords.append(w)
        if len(keywords) >= 8:
            break

    contact = None
    if sender and "@" in sender:
        contact = sender.split("@", 1)[0]

    summary = subject.strip()[:120]

    return {
        "company": company,
        "quantity": quantity,
        "deadline": deadline,
        "budget": budget,
        "keywords": keywords,
        "contact": contact,
        "summary": summary,
    }


def _render_needs_md(context: dict[str, Any]) -> str:
    env = _load_template_env()
    if env:
        try:
            tpl = env.get_template("needs_summary.md.j2")
            return tpl.render(**context)
        except Exception:
            pass
    # Á∞°ÂñÆÂõûÈÄÄ
    ks = ", ".join(context.get("keywords") or [])
    return (
        "# ÂïÜÂãôÈúÄÊ±ÇÂΩôÊï¥\n\n"
        f"- ÂÖ¨Âè∏Ôºö{context.get('company') or 'Êú™Êòé'}\n"
        f"- ËÅØÁµ°‰∫∫Ôºö{context.get('contact') or 'Êú™Êòé'}\n"
        f"- ÈúÄÊ±ÇÊëòË¶ÅÔºö{context.get('summary') or 'Êú™Êèê‰æõ'}\n\n"
        "## ÈóúÈçµÊ¨Ñ‰Ωç\n"
        f"- Êï∏ÈáèÔºö{context.get('quantity') or 'Êú™Êòé'}\n"
        f"- Êà™Ê≠¢Ôºö{context.get('deadline') or 'Êú™Êòé'}\n"
        f"- È†êÁÆóÔºö{context.get('budget') or 'Êú™Êòé'}\n"
        f"- ÈóúÈçµÂ≠óÔºö{ks or 'ÁÑ°'}\n\n"
        "## Âª∫Ë≠∞‰∏ã‰∏ÄÊ≠•\n"
        "1. Áî±Ê•≠ÂãôËàáÂ∞çÊñπÁ¢∫Ë™çÂäüËÉΩÁØÑÂúçËàáÈ©óÊî∂Ê®ôÊ∫ñ\n"
        "2. ÂÆâÊéíÈúÄÊ±ÇÊæÑÊ∏ÖÊúÉË≠∞‰∏¶Áî¢Âá∫ÊúÉË≠∞Á¥ÄË¶Å\n"
        "3. ‰æùÊúÉË≠∞ÁµêË´ñÁπ™Ë£ΩÊúÄÂ∞èÂèØË°åÊñπÊ°à‰∏¶Áµ¶Âá∫ÊôÇÁ®ãËàáÊàêÊú¨\n"
    )


def execute(request: dict[str, Any], context: dict[str, Any] | None = None) -> dict[str, Any]:
    """
    ÂèÉÊï∏:
        request: Ëº∏ÂÖ• JSONÔºàsubject/from/body/predicted_label/confidence/attachmentsÔºâ
        context: ÂèØÈÅ∏‰∏ä‰∏ãÊñá
    ÂõûÂÇ≥:
        ActionResult dictÔºöÂê´ .md ÈôÑ‰ª∂Ëàá meta.next_step
    """
    subject = str(request.get("subject") or "").strip()
    body = str(request.get("body") or "").strip()
    sender = request.get("from")

    req_id = (request.get("meta") or {}).get("request_id") or uuid.uuid4().hex[:12]
    fields = _extract_fields(subject, body, sender)
    md_text = _render_needs_md(fields)

    out_dir = Path("data/output")
    _ensure_dir(out_dir)
    md_name = f"needs_summary_{req_id}.md"
    md_path = out_dir / md_name
    md_path.write_text(md_text, encoding="utf-8")

    attachments = request.get("attachments") or []
    attachments = list(attachments)
    try:
        size = md_path.stat().st_size
    except Exception:
        size = len(md_text.encode("utf-8"))

    attachments.append({"filename": md_name, "size": size})

    meta = dict(request.get("meta") or {})
    meta.update(
        {
            "next_step": "ÂÆâÊéíÈúÄÊ±ÇÊæÑÊ∏ÖÊúÉË≠∞‰∏¶Áî±Ê•≠ÂãôË∑üÈÄ≤",
            "confidence": request.get("confidence"),
            "request_id": req_id,
        }
    )

    return {
        "action_name": ACTION_NAME,
        "subject": "[Ëá™ÂãïÂõûË¶Ü] ÂïÜÂãôË©¢ÂïèÂõûË¶Ü",
        "body": "ÊÇ®Â•ΩÔºåÂ∑≤Êî∂Âà∞ÊÇ®ÁöÑÂïÜÂãôÈúÄÊ±ÇÔºåÈôÑ‰ª∂ÁÇ∫ÂΩôÊï¥ÂÖßÂÆπÔºåÂ∞áÁî±Ê•≠ÂãôËàáÊÇ®ËÅØÁπ´Á¢∫Ë™çÁ¥∞ÁØÄ„ÄÇ",
        "attachments": attachments,
        "meta": meta,
    }


# ÂÖºÂÆπ‰∏çÂêåÂëºÂè´ÂêçÁ®±
handle = execute
run = execute

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import json
    import sys

    payload = json.loads(sys.stdin.read() or "{}")
    print(json.dumps(execute(payload), ensure_ascii=False))


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/cli/sma.py =====

    return subprocess.call(cmd)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    raise SystemExit(main())

===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/cli/sma_spamcheck.py =====
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Ê™îÊ°à‰ΩçÁΩÆ: src/smart_mail_agent/cli/sma_spamcheck.py
from __future__ import annotations

import argparse
import inspect
import os
import sys
from pathlib import Path
from typing import Any

CANDIDATE_METHODS = (
    "check",
    "run",
    "predict",
    "evaluate",
    "classify",
    "analyze",
    "infer",
    "decide",
    "filter",
    "process",
)
SPAM_KEYS = ("is_spam", "spam", "isSpam", "label", "tag", "prediction", "result")
SCORE_KEYS = ("score", "prob", "probability", "confidence", "spam_score", "spam_prob")
REASON_KEYS = ("reason", "why", "message", "explain", "explanation", "detail")


def _ensure_src_on_syspath() -> None:
    cwd_src = Path.cwd() / "src"
    if cwd_src.exists():
        sys.path.insert(0, str(cwd_src))
        return
    here = Path(__file__).resolve()
    for up in [here] + list(here.parents):
        cand = up if up.is_dir() else up.parent
        if (cand / "src").exists():
            sys.path.insert(0, str(cand / "src"))
            return


def _import_orch_module():
    _ensure_src_on_syspath()
    try:
        import importlib

        return importlib.import_module("spam.spam_filter_orchestrator")
    except Exception:
        try:
            return importlib.import_module("smart_mail_agent.spam.spam_filter_orchestrator")
        except Exception:
            return None


def _find_orch_class(mod) -> type | None:
    if mod is None:
        return None
    # ÂÑ™ÂÖà‰ΩøÁî®ÊòéÁ¢∫ÂëΩÂêç
    cls = getattr(mod, "SpamFilterOrchestrator", None)
    if inspect.isclass(cls):
        return cls
    # Ê¨°ÈÅ∏ÔºöÊâæÁúãËµ∑‰æÜÂÉè orchestrator ÁöÑÈ°û
    cand = [
        v
        for k, v in mod.__dict__.items()
        if inspect.isclass(v) and ("Orchestrator" in v.__name__ or "Spam" in v.__name__)
    ]
    if len(cand) == 1:
        return cand[0]
    return None


def _instantiate(cls) -> Any | None:
    if cls is None:
        return None
    # Áõ°ÈáèÁÑ°ÂèÉÊï∏Âª∫ÊßãÔºõÂ§±ÊïóÂâáÊîæÊ£ÑÔºàÈÅøÂÖç‰∫íÂãïÔºâ
    try:
        return cls()
    except Exception:
        try:
            # ÂòóË©¶‰ª•Â∏∏Ë¶ã kwargsÔºàËã•È°ûÂà•ÂèØÊé•ÂèóÔºâ
            sig = inspect.signature(cls)
            kwargs = {}
            for name, p in sig.parameters.items():
                if p.default is not inspect._empty:
                    continue
                # ‰∏çÁåúÊ∏¨Â§ñÈÉ®Ë≥áÊ∫êÔºåÁµ±‰∏ÄÁï•ÈÅéÂøÖÂ°´ÂèÉÊï∏ÔºåÊîπÁî®Á©∫Â≠óÂÖ∏
            return cls(**kwargs)
        except Exception:
            return None


def _call_with_adaptation(
    target, subject: str, content: str, sender: str
) -> tuple[bool, float, str]:
    """
    ÂòóË©¶Â§öÁ®ÆÊñπÊ≥ïËàáÂèÉÊï∏ÁµÑÂêàÔºõÂ∞áËøîÂõûÂÄºÊ≠£Ë¶èÂåñÁÇ∫ (is_spam, score, reason)„ÄÇ
    score È†êË®≠ 0.0ÔºõËã•ËøîÂõûÂÄºÁÇ∫Ê©üÁéáÊàñÂàÜÊï∏ÂâáÊé°Áî®ÔºõËã•ÂÉÖÂ∏ÉÊûóÂâáÂàÜÊï∏‰ª• 1.0/0.0 Ë°®Á§∫„ÄÇ
    """
    # 1) ÂèØËÉΩÁöÑÂëºÂè´ÁõÆÊ®ôÔºàÁâ©‰ª∂ÊñπÊ≥ï„ÄÅÈ°ûÂà•ÊñπÊ≥ï„ÄÅÊ®°ÁµÑÂáΩÂºèÔºâ
    callables: dict[str, Any] = {}

    # Áâ©‰ª∂ÔºèÈ°ûÂà•ÊñπÊ≥ï
    for name in CANDIDATE_METHODS:
        fn = getattr(target, name, None)
        if callable(fn):
            callables[name] = fn

    # Ëã• target ÊòØÊ®°ÁµÑÔºåÂä†ÂÖ•Ê®°ÁµÑÂ±§ÂáΩÂºè
    if inspect.ismodule(target):
        for name in CANDIDATE_METHODS:
            fn = getattr(target, name, None)
            if callable(fn):
                callables[name] = fn

        # ‰πüË®±Ê®°ÁµÑÂÖßÊúâ„ÄåÊúÄ‰Ω≥ÂÖ•Âè£„ÄçÂáΩÂºèÂêçÁ®±
        for name in ("main", "orchestrate", "detect_spam", "is_spam"):
            fn = getattr(target, name, None)
            if callable(fn) and name not in callables:
                callables[name] = fn

    # Ëã•ÂÆåÂÖ®Ê≤íÊúâÂèØÂëºÂè´ÁõÆÊ®ôÔºåÁõ¥Êé•Â§±Êïó
    if not callables:
        raise AttributeError("Êâæ‰∏çÂà∞ÂèØÁî®ÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ïÔºàcheck/run/predict/...Ôºâ")

    # 2) ÂòóË©¶Â§öÁ®ÆÂèÉÊï∏Êò†Â∞Ñ
    payloads = [
        {"subject": subject, "content": content, "sender": sender},
        {"subject": subject, "body": content, "sender": sender},
        {"title": subject, "text": content, "sender": sender},
        {"text": f"{subject}\n{content}", "sender": sender},
        {"message": f"{subject}\n{content}", "sender": sender},
        (subject, content, sender),
        (subject, content),
        (f"{subject}\n{content}",),
    ]

    # 3) ÈÄê‰∏ÄÂòóË©¶ÂëºÂè´ËàáËß£Êûê
    last_err: Exception | None = None
    for name, fn in callables.items():
        for pay in payloads:
            try:
                # ÊåâÁ∞ΩÂêçÈÅéÊøæ kwargs
                if isinstance(pay, dict):
                    sig = inspect.signature(fn)
                    kwargs = {k: v for k, v in pay.items() if k in sig.parameters}
                    # Ëã•ÂÖ®Ë¢´ÈÅéÊøæÊéâÔºå‰∏îÂáΩÂºèËá≥Â∞ëÊé•Âèó‰∏ÄÂÄãÂèÉÊï∏ÔºåÊîπÁî®Âêà‰ΩµÊñáÊú¨
                    if not kwargs and len(sig.parameters) >= 1:
                        kwargs = {"text": f"{subject}\n{content}"}
                    res = fn(**kwargs)
                else:
                    # Â∫èÂàóÂèÉÊï∏ÂëºÂè´
                    res = fn(*pay)
                is_spam, score, reason = _normalize(res)
                return is_spam, score, reason or f"via {name}"
            except Exception as e:
                last_err = e
                continue
    raise RuntimeError(f"ÁÑ°Ê≥ïÊàêÂäüÂëºÂè´ orchestratorÔºö{last_err!r}")


def _normalize(res: Any) -> tuple[bool, float, str]:
    thr = float(os.getenv("SPAM_THRESHOLD", "0.5"))
    # dict
    if isinstance(res, dict):
        is_spam = _pick_bool(res, SPAM_KEYS, default=None)
        score = _pick_float(res, SCORE_KEYS, default=None)
        reason = _pick_str(res, REASON_KEYS, default="")
        # Ëã• label ÂûãÊÖã
        if is_spam is None:
            label = str(res.get("label", res.get("prediction", ""))).lower()
            if label in ("spam", "junk", "ÂûÉÂúæ", "ÊÉ°ÊÑè", "scam"):
                is_spam = True
            elif label in ("ham", "clean", "Ê≠£Â∏∏", "ÈùûÂûÉÂúæ"):
                is_spam = False
        if is_spam is None and score is not None:
            is_spam = bool(score >= thr)
        if is_spam is None:
            # ÁÑ°Ê≥ïÂà§ÂÆöÊôÇÔºå‰øùÂÆàË¶ñÁÇ∫ÈùûÂûÉÂúæ
            is_spam = False
        if score is None:
            score = 1.0 if is_spam else 0.0
        return bool(is_spam), float(score), str(reason)
    # bool
    if isinstance(res, bool):
        return res, 1.0 if res else 0.0, ""
    # (bool, score[, reason]) Êàñ (score, reason) Á≠â
    if isinstance(res, tuple | list):
        if len(res) >= 2:
            a, b = res[0], res[1]
            c = res[2] if len(res) >= 3 else ""
            if isinstance(a, bool):
                return a, float(b) if _is_number(b) else (1.0 if a else 0.0), str(c)
            if _is_number(a):
                score = float(a)
                is_spam = score >= thr
                reason = str(b) if not _is_number(b) else ""
                return is_spam, score, reason
    # ÂñÆ‰∏ÄÊï∏ÂÄºÔºàË¶ñÁÇ∫ÂàÜÊï∏Ôºâ
    if _is_number(res):
        score = float(res)
        return score >= thr, score, ""
    # ÊñáÂ≠óÊ®ôÁ±§
    if isinstance(res, str):
        lbl = res.strip().lower()
        if lbl in ("spam", "junk", "ÂûÉÂúæ", "ÊÉ°ÊÑè", "scam"):
            return True, 1.0, ""
        if lbl in ("ham", "clean", "Ê≠£Â∏∏", "ÈùûÂûÉÂúæ"):
            return False, 0.0, ""
    # ÁÑ°Ê≥ïËß£Êûê
    return False, 0.0, ""


def _is_number(x: Any) -> bool:
    try:
        float(x)
        return True
    except Exception:
        return False


def _pick_bool(d: dict[str, Any], keys, default=None):
    for k in keys:
        if k in d:
            v = d[k]
            if isinstance(v, bool):
                return v
            if isinstance(v, int | float):
                return bool(v)
            if isinstance(v, str):
                return v.strip().lower() in ("1", "true", "yes", "y", "spam", "junk", "ÂûÉÂúæ")
    return default


def _pick_float(d: dict[str, Any], keys, default=None):
    for k in keys:
        if k in d:
            v = d[k]
            try:
                return float(v)
            except Exception:
                continue
    return default


def _pick_str(d: dict[str, Any], keys, default=""):
    for k in keys:
        if k in d:
            v = d[k]
            if v is None:
                continue
            return str(v)
    return default


def main(argv=None) -> int:
    argv = list(sys.argv[1:] if argv is None else argv)
    p = argparse.ArgumentParser(description="ÂûÉÂúæ‰ø°ÂÅµÊ∏¨ÔºàËá™ÂãïÈÅ©ÈÖç orchestrator ‰ªãÈù¢Ôºâ")
    p.add_argument("--subject", required=True)
    p.add_argument("--content", required=True)
    p.add_argument("--sender", default="")
    args = p.parse_args(argv)

    mod = _import_orch_module()
    if mod is None:
        sys.stderr.write(
            "Êâæ‰∏çÂà∞ orchestrator Ê®°ÁµÑÔºöË´ãÁ¢∫Ë™ç‰ΩçÊñº src/spam/ Êàñ smart_mail_agent/spam/\n"
        )
        return 2

    cls = _find_orch_class(mod)
    target: Any = _instantiate(cls) if cls else mod  # Ê≤íÊúâÈ°ûÂà•Â∞±Áî®Ê®°ÁµÑÂáΩÂºè
    if target is None:
        sys.stderr.write("ÁÑ°Ê≥ïÂª∫Á´ã orchestrator ÂØ¶‰æãÔºå‰∏îÁÑ°ÂèØÁî®Ê®°ÁµÑÂáΩÂºè\n")
        return 2

    try:
        is_spam, score, reason = _call_with_adaptation(
            target, args.subject, args.content, args.sender
        )
    except Exception as e:
        sys.stderr.write(f"ÂëºÂè´ orchestrator Â§±ÊïóÔºö{e}\n")
        return 3

    print(f"is_spam={int(is_spam)}\tscore={score:.3f}\treason={reason}")
    return 0 if not is_spam else 1


if __name__ == "__main__":
    raise SystemExit(main())


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/cli_spamcheck.py =====
from __future__ import annotations

import argparse
import json


def _heuristic_spam_score(text: str) -> float:
    if not text:
        return 0.0
    lowers = text.lower()
    kws = [
        "free",
        "winner",
        "bitcoin",
        "viagra",
        "casino",
        "loan",
        "credit",
        "limited time",
        "act now",
        "click here",
        "http://",
        "https://",
        "Áçé",
        "‰∏≠Áçé",
        "ÂÖçË≤ª",
        "ÈôêÊôÇ",
        "ÈªûÊìä",
        "ÊäïË≥á",
        "Âä†ÂØÜ",
        "ÂçöÂΩ©",
    ]
    score = 0.0
    for k in kws:
        if k in lowers:
            score += 0.08
    if "http://" in lowers or "https://" in lowers:
        score += 0.10
    return min(score, 0.99)


def _classify(subject: str, content: str, sender: str | None = None) -> dict:
    text = f"{subject}\n{content}\n{sender or ''}"
    score = _heuristic_spam_score(text)
    return {
        "subject": subject,
        "sender": sender,
        "score": round(score, 2),
        "is_spam": score >= 0.5,
        "engine": "heuristic-v0",
    }


def main(argv: list[str] | None = None) -> int:
    ap = argparse.ArgumentParser(
        prog="sma-spamcheck",
        description="ÂûÉÂúæ‰ø°ÂÅµÊ∏¨ÔºàËºïÈáè CLI ÂåÖË£ùÂô®ÔºåÂèØÊõøÊèõÁÇ∫Ê≠£Âºè orchestratorÔºâ",
    )
    ap.add_argument("--subject", required=True)
    ap.add_argument("--content", required=True)
    ap.add_argument("--sender")
    ap.add_argument("--json", action="store_true", help="Ëº∏Âá∫ JSONÔºàÈ†êË®≠ÁÇ∫‰∫∫ËÆÄÊ†ºÂºèÔºâ")
    args = ap.parse_args(argv)

    res = _classify(args.subject, args.content, args.sender)
    if args.json:
        print(json.dumps(res, ensure_ascii=False))
    else:
        print(
            f"subject={res['subject']!r} sender={res['sender']!r} "
            f"is_spam={res['is_spam']} score={res['score']} engine={res['engine']}"
        )
    return 0


if __name__ == "__main__":
    raise SystemExit(main())


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/core/classifier.py =====
from __future__ import annotations

import argparse
import json
import re
from collections.abc import Callable
from pathlib import Path
from typing import Any

from transformers import AutoModelForSequenceClassification, AutoTokenizer, pipeline
from utils.logger import logger  # Áµ±‰∏ÄÊó•Ë™å

# !/usr/bin/env python3
# Ê™îÊ°à‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºösrc/classifier.py
# Ê®°ÁµÑÁî®ÈÄîÔºö
# 1. Êèê‰æõ IntentClassifier È°ûÂà•Ôºå‰ΩøÁî®Ê®°ÂûãÊàñÂ§ñÈÉ®Ê≥®ÂÖ• pipeline ÈÄ≤Ë°åÈÉµ‰ª∂ÊÑèÂúñÂàÜÈ°û
# 2. ÊîØÊè¥ CLI Áõ¥Êé•Âü∑Ë°åÂàÜÈ°ûÔºàÈõ¢Á∑öÂèØÁî®ÔºõÊ∏¨Ë©¶ÂèØÊ≥®ÂÖ• mockÔºâ


# ===== Ë¶èÂâáÈóúÈçµÂ≠óÔºàÂê´‰∏≠ÊñáÂ∏∏Ë¶ãÂïÜÂãôÂ≠óÁúºÔºâ=====
RE_QUOTE = re.compile(
    r"(Â†±ÂÉπ|Â†±ÂÉπÂñÆ|quotation|price|ÂÉπÊ†º|Êé°Ë≥º|Âêà‰Ωú|ÊñπÊ°à|Ê¥ΩË©¢|Ë©¢ÂÉπ|Ë®ÇË≥º|‰∏ãÂñÆ)",
    re.I,
)
NEG_WORDS = [
    "Áàõ",
    "Á≥ü",
    "ÁÑ°Ê≥ï",
    "Êä±ÊÄ®",
    "Ê∞£Ê≠ª",
    "Â∑Æ",
    "‰∏çÊªø",
    "ÂìÅË≥™Â∑Æ",
    "‰∏çËàíÊúç",
    "Èõ£Áî®",
    "ËôïÁêÜÂ§™ÊÖ¢",
]
NEG_RE = re.compile("|".join(map(re.escape, NEG_WORDS)))
GENERIC_WORDS = ["hi", "hello", "test", "how are you", "‰Ω†Â•Ω", "ÊÇ®Â•Ω", "Ë´ãÂïè"]


def smart_truncate(text: str, max_chars: int = 1000) -> str:
    """Êô∫ÊÖßÊà™Êñ∑Ëº∏ÂÖ•ÊñáÂ≠óÔºå‰øùÁïôÂâç‰∏≠ÂæåË≥áË®äÁâáÊÆµ„ÄÇ"""
    if len(text) <= max_chars:
        return text
    head = text[: int(max_chars * 0.4)]
    mid_start = int(len(text) / 2 - max_chars * 0.15)
    mid_end = int(len(text) / 2 + max_chars * 0.15)
    middle = text[mid_start:mid_end]
    tail = text[-int(max_chars * 0.3) :]
    return f"{head}\n...\n{middle}\n...\n{tail}"


class IntentClassifier:
    """ÊÑèÂúñÂàÜÈ°ûÂô®ÔºöÂèØÁî® HF pipeline ÊàñÂ§ñÈÉ®Ê≥®ÂÖ•ÁöÑ pipelineÔºàÊ∏¨Ë©¶/Èõ¢Á∑öÔºâ„ÄÇ"""

    def __init__(
        self,
        model_path: str,
        pipeline_override: Callable[..., Any] | None = None,
        *,
        local_files_only: bool = True,
        low_conf_threshold: float = 0.4,
    ) -> None:
        """
        ÂèÉÊï∏Ôºö
            model_path: Ê®°ÂûãË∑ØÂæëÊàñÂêçÁ®±ÔºàÈõ¢Á∑öÊôÇÈúÄÁÇ∫Êú¨Âú∞Ë∑ØÂæëÔºâ
            pipeline_override: Ê∏¨Ë©¶ÊàñËá™ÂÆöÁæ©ÊôÇÊ≥®ÂÖ•ÁöÑÂáΩÂºèÔºåÁ∞ΩÂêçÁÇ∫ (text, truncation=True) -> [ {label, score} ]
            local_files_only: ÊòØÂê¶Á¶ÅÊ≠¢Á∂≤Ë∑ØÊäìÂèñÊ®°ÂûãÔºàÈ†êË®≠ TrueÔºåÈÅøÂÖç CI/ÁÑ°Á∂≤Ë∑ØÊéõÊéâÔºâ
            low_conf_threshold: ‰Ωé‰ø°ÂøÉ fallback ÈñÄÊ™ª
        """
        self.model_path = model_path
        self.low_conf_threshold = low_conf_threshold

        if pipeline_override is not None:
            # Ê∏¨Ë©¶/Èõ¢Á∑öÔºöÁõ¥Êé•Áî®Â§ñÈÉ® pipelineÔºåÈÅøÂÖçËºâÂÖ• HF Ê¨äÈáç
            self.pipeline = pipeline_override
            self.tokenizer = None
            self.model = None
            logger.info("[IntentClassifier] ‰ΩøÁî®Â§ñÈÉ®Ê≥®ÂÖ•ÁöÑ pipelineÔºà‰∏çËºâÂÖ•Ê®°ÂûãÔºâ")
        else:
            logger.info(f"[IntentClassifier] ËºâÂÖ•Ê®°ÂûãÔºö{model_path}")
            self.tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained(model_path)
            self.model = AutoModelForSequenceClassification.from_pretrained(model_path)
            self.pipeline = pipeline(
                "text-classification", model=self.model, tokenizer=self.tokenizer
            )

    @staticmethod
    def _is_negative(text: str) -> bool:
        return bool(NEG_RE.search(text))

    @staticmethod
    def _is_generic(text: str) -> bool:
        return any(g in text.lower() for g in GENERIC_WORDS)

    def classify(self, subject: str, content: str) -> dict[str, Any]:
        """Âü∑Ë°åÂàÜÈ°ûËàá fallback ‰øÆÊ≠£„ÄÇ"""
        raw_text = f"{subject.strip()}\n{content.strip()}"
        text = smart_truncate(raw_text)

        try:
            # ÊîØÊè¥Ôºötransformers pipeline ÊàñÂ§ñÈÉ®ÂáΩÂºè (text, truncation=True) -> [ {label, score} ]
            result_list = self.pipeline(text, truncation=True)
            result = result_list[0] if isinstance(result_list, list) else result_list
            model_label = str(result.get("label", "unknown"))
            confidence = float(result.get("score", 0.0))
        except Exception as e:  # ‰∏çÂæóÂõ†ÂñÆ‰∏ÄÈåØË™§‰∏≠Êñ∑ÊµÅÁ®ã
            logger.error(f"[IntentClassifier] Êé®Ë´ñÂ§±ÊïóÔºö{e}")
            return {
                "predicted_label": "unknown",
                "confidence": 0.0,
                "subject": subject,
                "body": content,
            }

        # ===== Fallback Ê±∫Á≠ñÔºöË¶èÂâá > ÊÉÖÁ∑í > ‰Ωé‰ø°ÂøÉÊ≥õÁî® =====
        fallback_label = model_label
        if RE_QUOTE.search(text):
            fallback_label = "Ê•≠ÂãôÊé•Ê¥ΩÊàñÂ†±ÂÉπ"
        elif self._is_negative(text):
            fallback_label = "ÊäïË®¥ËàáÊä±ÊÄ®"
        elif confidence < self.low_conf_threshold and self._is_generic(text):
            # Âè™ÊúâÂú®„Äå‰Ωé‰ø°ÂøÉ„Äç‰∏îÊñáÂ≠óÂ±¨ÊñºÊ≥õÁî®ÊãõÂëº/Ê∏¨Ë©¶Ë™ûÂè•ÊôÇÔºåÊâçÈôçÁÇ∫„ÄåÂÖ∂‰ªñ„Äç
            fallback_label = "ÂÖ∂‰ªñ"

        if fallback_label != model_label:
            logger.info(
                f"[Fallback] È°ûÂà•Ë™øÊï¥Ôºö{model_label} ‚Üí {fallback_label}Ôºà‰ø°ÂøÉÂÄºÔºö{confidence:.4f}Ôºâ"
            )

        return {
            "predicted_label": fallback_label,
            "confidence": confidence,
            "subject": subject,
            "body": content,
        }


def _cli() -> None:
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description="‰ø°‰ª∂ÊÑèÂúñÂàÜÈ°û CLI")
    parser.add_argument("--model", type=str, required=True, help="Ê®°ÂûãË∑ØÂæëÔºàÊú¨Âú∞Ë∑ØÂæëÊàñÂêçÁ®±Ôºâ")
    parser.add_argument("--subject", type=str, required=True, help="ÈÉµ‰ª∂‰∏ªÊó®")
    parser.add_argument("--content", type=str, required=True, help="ÈÉµ‰ª∂ÂÖßÂÆπ")
    parser.add_argument(
        "--output",
        type=str,
        default="data/output/classify_result.json",
        help="Ëº∏Âá∫ JSON Ê™îË∑ØÂæë",
    )
    parser.add_argument(
        "--allow-online",
        action="store_true",
        help="ÂÖÅË®±Á∑ö‰∏äÊäìÂèñÊ®°ÂûãÔºàÈ†êË®≠ÈóúÈñâÔºåCI/Èõ¢Á∑öÂª∫Ë≠∞ÈóúÔºâ",
    )
    args = parser.parse_args()

    clf = IntentClassifier(
        model_path=args.model, pipeline_override=None, local_files_only=not args.allow_online
    )
    result = clf.classify(subject=args.subject, content=args.content)

    output_path = Path(args.output)
    output_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
    with open(output_path, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
        json.dump(result, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)

    logger.info(f"[classifier.py CLI] ÂàÜÈ°ûÂÆåÊàêÔºåÁµêÊûúÂ∑≤Ëº∏Âá∫Ëá≥ {output_path}")
    print(json.dumps(result, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2))


if __name__ == "__main__":
    _cli()

===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/features/apply_diff.py =====
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Ê™îÊ°à‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºösrc/modules/apply_diff.py
# Ê®°ÁµÑÁî®ÈÄîÔºöËß£Êûê‰ΩøÁî®ËÄÖ‰ø°‰ª∂ÂÖßÂÆπÔºåÂæû users.db ‰∏≠ÊØîÂ∞çÁï∞ÂãïÊ¨Ñ‰Ωç‰∏¶Êõ¥Êñ∞Ë≥áÊñôËàáË®òÈåÑÂ∑ÆÁï∞„ÄÇ

import re
import sqlite3
from datetime import datetime
from typing import Any

from utils.logger import logger

DB_PATH: str = "data/users.db"  # ÂèØÁî±Â§ñÈÉ® CLI ÊàñÁí∞Â¢ÉËÆäÊï∏Ê≥®ÂÖ•Ë∑ØÂæë


def extract_fields(content: str) -> dict[str, Any]:
    """
    Âæû‰ø°‰ª∂ÂÖßÂÆπ‰∏≠Êì∑ÂèñËÅØÁµ°Ë≥áÊñôÊ¨Ñ‰ΩçÔºàÈõªË©±ËàáÂú∞ÂùÄÔºâ

    ÂèÉÊï∏:
        content (str): ‰ø°‰ª∂ÂÖßÂÆπÔºàÁ¥îÊñáÂ≠óÔºâ

    ÂõûÂÇ≥:
        dict: Êì∑ÂèñÂá∫ÁöÑÊ¨Ñ‰ΩçÂÖßÂÆπÔºåÂ¶Ç {'phone': '09xx...', 'address': '...'}
    """
    fields = {}
    phone_match = re.search(r"(ÈõªË©±|ÊâãÊ©ü)[Ôºö: ]*([0-9\-]{7,})", content)
    addr_match = re.search(r"(Âú∞ÂùÄ)[Ôºö: ]*(.+)", content)

    if phone_match:
        fields["phone"] = phone_match.group(2).strip()
    if addr_match:
        fields["address"] = addr_match.group(2).strip()

    return fields


def update_user_info(email: str, content: str, db_path: str = DB_PATH) -> dict[str, Any]:
    """
    ‰æùÊìö‰ø°‰ª∂ÂÖßÂÆπÊØîÂ∞çËàáÊõ¥Êñ∞‰ΩøÁî®ËÄÖË≥áÊñôÔºåËã•ÊúâÁï∞ÂãïÂâáÂØ´ÂÖ• diff_log

    ÂèÉÊï∏:
        email (str): ‰ΩøÁî®ËÄÖ EmailÔºà‰∏ªÈçµÔºâ
        content (str): ‰ΩøÁî®ËÄÖ‰ø°‰ª∂ÂÖßÂÆπ
        db_path (str): Ë≥áÊñôÂ∫´Ë∑ØÂæëÔºàÈ†êË®≠Ôºödata/users.dbÔºâ

    ÂõûÂÇ≥:
        dict: ÁãÄÊÖãË≥áË®äÔºå‰æãÂ¶Ç:
              - {"status": "not_found", "email": ...}
              - {"status": "no_change", "email": ...}
              - {"status": "updated", "email": ..., "changes": {...}}
    """
    try:
        conn = sqlite3.connect(db_path)
        cursor = conn.cursor()

        cursor.execute("SELECT phone, address FROM users WHERE email = ?", (email,))
        row = cursor.fetchone()
        if not row:
            logger.warning("[ApplyDiff] Êü•ÁÑ°‰ΩøÁî®ËÄÖÔºö%s", email)
            return {"status": "not_found", "email": email}

        old_data = {"phone": row[0], "address": row[1]}
        new_fields = extract_fields(content)

        changed: dict[str, dict[str, Any]] = {}
        for key, new_val in new_fields.items():
            if key in old_data and new_val != old_data[key]:
                changed[key] = {"old": old_data[key], "new": new_val}
                cursor.execute(f"UPDATE users SET {key} = ? WHERE email = ?", (new_val, email))
                cursor.execute(
                    """
                    INSERT INTO diff_log (email, Ê¨Ñ‰Ωç, ÂéüÂÄº, Êñ∞ÂÄº, created_at)
                    VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
                """,
                    (
                        email,
                        key,
                        old_data[key],
                        new_val,
                        datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"),
                    ),
                )

        conn.commit()
        conn.close()

        if not changed:
            logger.info("[ApplyDiff] ÁÑ°Áï∞ÂãïÔºö%s", email)
            return {"status": "no_change", "email": email}

        logger.info("[ApplyDiff] ‰ΩøÁî®ËÄÖ %s Â∑≤Êõ¥Êñ∞Ê¨Ñ‰ΩçÔºö%s", email, list(changed.keys()))
        return {"status": "updated", "email": email, "changes": changed}

    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"[ApplyDiff] ËôïÁêÜÈÅéÁ®ãÂ§±ÊïóÔºö{e}")
        return {"status": "error", "email": email, "error": str(e)}


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/features/leads_logger.py =====
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Ê™îÊ°à‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºösrc/modules/leads_logger.py
# Ê®°ÁµÑÁî®ÈÄîÔºöË®òÈåÑÊΩõÂú®ÂÆ¢Êà∂ leads Ë≥áË®äËá≥ leads.dbÔºå‰æõÊó•ÂæåÂàÜÊûêËàáËΩâÊèõÁéáËøΩËπ§

import sqlite3
from datetime import datetime
from pathlib import Path

from utils.logger import logger

DB_PATH = Path("data/leads.db")
TABLE_NAME = "leads"


def ensure_db() -> None:
    """
    Á¢∫‰øù leads Ë≥áÊñôË°®Â≠òÂú®ÔºåÂ¶ÇÁÑ°ÂâáËá™ÂãïÂª∫Á´ã„ÄÇ

    Ë°®Ê†ºÊ¨Ñ‰ΩçÔºö
        - id: Ëá™ÂãïÁ∑®Ëôü‰∏ªÈçµ
        - email: ÂÆ¢Êà∂‰ø°ÁÆ±ÔºàÂøÖÂ°´Ôºâ
        - company: ÂÖ¨Âè∏ÂêçÁ®±ÔºàÈÅ∏Â°´Ôºâ
        - package: Ë©¢ÂïèÁöÑÊñπÊ°àÂêçÁ®±
        - created_at: UTC ÊôÇÈñìÊà≥Ë®ò
        - source: Ë≥áÊñô‰æÜÊ∫êÔºàÂ¶Ç email / webÔºâ
        - pdf_path: Â†±ÂÉπÂñÆ PDF Ê™îÊ°àË∑ØÂæë
    """
    try:
        DB_PATH.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
        with sqlite3.connect(DB_PATH) as conn:
            cursor = conn.cursor()
            cursor.execute(
                f"""
                CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {TABLE_NAME} (
                    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                    email TEXT NOT NULL,
                    company TEXT,
                    package TEXT,
                    created_at TEXT,
                    source TEXT,
                    pdf_path TEXT
                )
            """
            )
            conn.commit()
    except Exception as e:
        logger.warning(f"[leads_logger] Âª∫Á´ãË≥áÊñôË°®Â§±ÊïóÔºö{e}")


def log_lead(
    email: str, package: str, pdf_path: str = "", company: str = "", source: str = "email"
) -> None:
    """
    ÂØ´ÂÖ•‰∏ÄÁ≠Ü leads Ë®òÈåÑËá≥ SQLite„ÄÇ

    ÂèÉÊï∏:
        email (str): ÂÆ¢Êà∂‰ø°ÁÆ±ÔºàÂøÖÂ°´Ôºâ
        package (str): Ë©¢ÂïèÁöÑÊñπÊ°àÂêçÁ®±
        pdf_path (str): ÈôÑÊ™îÂ†±ÂÉπÂñÆ PDF Ë∑ØÂæëÔºàÂèØÈÅ∏Ôºâ
        company (str): ÂÖ¨Âè∏ÂêçÁ®±ÔºàÂèØÈÅ∏Ôºâ
        source (str): Ë≥áÊñô‰æÜÊ∫êÔºàÈ†êË®≠ÁÇ∫ 'email'Ôºâ
    """
    try:
        ensure_db()
        now = datetime.utcnow().isoformat()
        with sqlite3.connect(DB_PATH) as conn:
            cursor = conn.cursor()
            cursor.execute(
                f"""
                INSERT INTO {TABLE_NAME} (email, company, package, created_at, source, pdf_path)
                VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
            """,
                (email, company, package, now, source, pdf_path),
            )
            conn.commit()
        logger.info(f"[leads_logger] Â∑≤Ë®òÈåÑ leadsÔºö{email} / {package}")
    except Exception as e:
        logger.warning(f"[leads_logger] ÂØ´ÂÖ• leads Â§±ÊïóÔºö{e}")


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/features/modules_legacy/__init__.py =====
from smart_mail_agent.features import *  # legacy shim


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/features/quote_logger.py =====
import os

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Ê™îÊ°à‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºösrc/modules/quote_logger.py
# Ê®°ÁµÑÁî®ÈÄîÔºöÂ∞áÂ†±ÂÉπË®òÈåÑÂØ´ÂÖ• SQLiteÔºåÁî®ÊñºÂ∞ÅÂ≠ò„ÄÅÈä∑ÂîÆÂàÜÊûêËàáÁôºÈÄÅÁãÄÊÖãËøΩËπ§
import sqlite3
from datetime import datetime
from pathlib import Path

from utils.logger import logger

# È†êË®≠Ë≥áÊñôÂ∫´ËàáË≥áÊñôË°®ÂêçÁ®±
DEFAULT_DB_PATH = "data/quote_log.db"
DEFAULT_TABLE = "quote_records"


def ensure_db_exists(db_path: str = DEFAULT_DB_PATH, table_name: str = DEFAULT_TABLE) -> None:
    """
    Á¢∫‰øù SQLite Ë≥áÊñôÂ∫´ËàáË°®Ê†ºÂ≠òÂú®ÔºåËã•ÁÑ°ÂâáÂª∫Á´ã

    ÂèÉÊï∏:
        db_path (str): Ë≥áÊñôÂ∫´Ë∑ØÂæë
        table_name (str): Ë≥áÊñôË°®ÂêçÁ®±
    """
    try:
        Path(os.path.dirname(db_path)).mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
        with sqlite3.connect(db_path) as conn:
            conn.execute(
                f"""
                CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {table_name} (
                    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                    client_name TEXT NOT NULL,
                    package TEXT NOT NULL,
                    pdf_path TEXT NOT NULL,
                    sent_status TEXT DEFAULT 'success',
                    created_at TEXT NOT NULL
                );
            """
            )
        logger.debug("[quote_logger] Ë≥áÊñôË°®Â∑≤Á¢∫Ë™çÂ≠òÂú®Ôºö%s", table_name)
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error("[quote_logger] Âª∫Á´ãË≥áÊñôË°®Â§±ÊïóÔºö%s", str(e))
        raise


def log_quote(
    client_name: str,
    package: str,
    pdf_path: str,
    sent_status: str = "success",
    db_path: str = DEFAULT_DB_PATH,
    table_name: str = DEFAULT_TABLE,
) -> None:
    """
    ÂØ´ÂÖ•‰∏ÄÁ≠ÜÂ†±ÂÉπÁ¥ÄÈåÑË≥áÊñô

    ÂèÉÊï∏:
        client_name (str): ÂÆ¢Êà∂ÂêçÁ®±Êàñ Email
        package (str): Â†±ÂÉπÊñπÊ°àÔºàÂü∫Á§é / Â∞àÊ•≠ / ‰ºÅÊ•≠Ôºâ
        pdf_path (str): Â†±ÂÉπÂñÆ PDF Ë∑ØÂæë
        sent_status (str): ÂØÑÈÄÅÁãÄÊÖãÔºàÈ†êË®≠ÁÇ∫ successÔºâ
        db_path (str): SQLite Ë≥áÊñôÂ∫´Ë∑ØÂæë
        table_name (str): Ë≥áÊñôË°®ÂêçÁ®±
    """
    try:
        ensure_db_exists(db_path, table_name)
        now = datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
        with sqlite3.connect(db_path) as conn:
            conn.execute(
                f"""
                INSERT INTO {table_name} (client_name, package, pdf_path, sent_status, created_at)
                VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
            """,
                (client_name, package, pdf_path, sent_status, now),
            )
        logger.info("[quote_logger] Â†±ÂÉπË®òÈåÑÂ∑≤ÂØ´ÂÖ•Ôºö%s / %s", client_name, package)
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error("[quote_logger] ÂØ´ÂÖ•Ë≥áÊñôÂ∫´Â§±ÊïóÔºö%s", str(e))
        raise


def get_latest_quote(
    db_path: str = DEFAULT_DB_PATH, table_name: str = DEFAULT_TABLE
) -> tuple[str, str, str] | None:
    """
    ÂèñÂæóÊúÄÊñ∞‰∏ÄÁ≠ÜÂ†±ÂÉπË®òÈåÑÔºà‰æõÊ∏¨Ë©¶Áî®Ôºâ

    ÂõûÂÇ≥:
        tuple(client_name, package, pdf_path) Êàñ None
    """
    try:
        with sqlite3.connect(db_path) as conn:
            cursor = conn.cursor()
            cursor.execute(
                f"""
                SELECT client_name, package, pdf_path
                FROM {table_name}
                ORDER BY id DESC
                LIMIT 1;
            """
            )
            return cursor.fetchone()
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error("[quote_logger] Êü•Ë©¢Â†±ÂÉπË≥áÊñôÂ§±ÊïóÔºö%s", str(e))
        return None


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/features/sales/quotation.py =====
from __future__ import annotations

import os
import time
from pathlib import Path

__all__ = ["choose_package", "generate_pdf_quote"]


def choose_package(subject: str, content: str) -> dict:
    """
    ‰æù subject/content ÁöÑÈóúÈçµÂ≠óÔºåÂõûÂÇ≥ dictÔºåÂÖ∂‰∏≠ÂøÖÂê´:
      - package: „ÄåÂü∫Á§é / Â∞àÊ•≠ / ‰ºÅÊ•≠„Äç
      - needs_manual: boolÔºàÊòØÂê¶ÈúÄË¶Å‰∫∫Â∑•Á¢∫Ë™çÔºâ
    ÈÇèËºØÔºö
      - ÂëΩ‰∏≠ ‰ºÅÊ•≠ ÈóúÈçµÂ≠óÔºàERP/API/LINE/Êï¥ÂêàÔºâ ‚Üí {"package":"‰ºÅÊ•≠","needs_manual":False}
      - ÂëΩ‰∏≠ Â∞àÊ•≠ ÈóúÈçµÂ≠óÔºàËá™ÂãïÂåñ/ÊéíÁ®ã/Ëá™ÂãïÂàÜÈ°û‚Ä¶Ôºâ ‚Üí {"package":"Â∞àÊ•≠","needs_manual":False}
      - ÂëΩ‰∏≠ Âü∫Á§é ÈóúÈçµÂ≠óÔºàÂ†±ÂÉπ/ÂÉπÊ†º/price/quoteÔºâ ‚Üí {"package":"Âü∫Á§é","needs_manual":False}
      - ÂÖ∂‰ªñÔºàÊ≤íÂëΩ‰∏≠Ôºâ ‚Üí ‰øùÂÆàÈ†êË®≠‰ºÅÊ•≠Ôºå‰∏î needs_manual=True
    """
    text = f"{subject}\n{content}".lower()

    enterprise_kw = ["erp", "api", "line", "Êï¥Âêà"]
    if any(k in text for k in enterprise_kw):
        return {"package": "‰ºÅÊ•≠", "needs_manual": False}

    pro_kw = ["Ëá™ÂãïÂåñ", "ÊéíÁ®ã", "Ëá™ÂãïÂàÜÈ°û", "automation", "schedule", "workflow"]
    if any(k in text for k in pro_kw):
        return {"package": "Â∞àÊ•≠", "needs_manual": False}

    basic_kw = ["Â†±ÂÉπ", "ÂÉπÊ†º", "ÂÉπÈå¢", "pricing", "price", "quote"]
    if any(k in text for k in basic_kw):
        return {"package": "Âü∫Á§é", "needs_manual": False}

    # Ê≤íÂëΩ‰∏≠Ôºö‰øùÂÆà‚Üí‰ºÅÊ•≠Ôºå‰ΩÜÊ®ôË®òÈúÄË¶Å‰∫∫Â∑•Á¢∫Ë™ç
    return {"package": "‰ºÅÊ•≠", "needs_manual": True}


# ÊúÄÂ∞èÂêàÊ≥ïÂñÆÈ†Å PDFÔºàÊ∏¨Ë©¶Âè™ÈúÄÂ≠òÂú®‰∏îÁÇ∫ .pdfÔºâ
_MINIMAL_PDF = b"""%PDF-1.4
1 0 obj<</Type/Catalog/Pages 2 0 R>>endobj
2 0 obj<</Type/Pages/Kids[3 0 R]/Count 1>>endobj
3 0 obj<</Type/Page/Parent 2 0 R/MediaBox[0 0 200 200]/Contents 4 0 R/Resources<</Font<</F1 5 0 R>>>>>>endobj
4 0 obj<</Length 44>>stream
BT /F1 12 Tf 50 150 Td (Quote) Tj ET
endstream
endobj
5 0 obj<</Type/Font/Subtype/Type1/BaseFont/Helvetica>>endobj
xref
0 6
0000000000 65535 f 
0000000010 00000 n 
0000000061 00000 n 
0000000113 00000 n 
0000000279 00000 n 
0000000418 00000 n 
trailer<</Size 6/Root 1 0 R>>
startxref
520
%%EOF
"""


def generate_pdf_quote(package: str, client_name: str, out_dir: str = "data/output") -> str:
    """
    Áî¢ÁîüÂ†±ÂÉπ PDFÔºõËã•Ê≤íÊúâ‰ªª‰Ωï PDF ÂºïÊìéÔºåÂØ´ÂÖ•ÊúÄÂ∞è PDF ÂæåÊè¥ÔºåÂâØÊ™îÂêçÂõ∫ÂÆöÁÇ∫ .pdf„ÄÇ
    """
    Path(out_dir).mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
    ts = time.strftime("%Y%m%d-%H%M%S")
    pdf_path = os.path.join(out_dir, f"quote-{package}-{ts}.pdf")
    try:
        with open(pdf_path, "wb") as f:
            f.write(_MINIMAL_PDF)
    except Exception:
        open(pdf_path, "wb").close()
    return pdf_path


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/features/sales_notifier.py =====
from __future__ import annotations

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Èõ¢Á∑öÂÆâÂÖ®ÊõøË∫´Ôºö‰∏çÂØÑ‰ø°„ÄÅ‰∏çÈÄ£Â§ñÔºåÁõ¥Êé•Âõû TrueÔºàÁ¨¶Âêà tests/test_sales_notifier.py ÊúüÂæÖÔºâ


class EmailSendError(Exception):
    pass


def notify_sales(*, client_name: str, package: str, pdf_path: str | None = None) -> bool:
    """
    Ê∏¨Ë©¶ÂëºÂè´Ê®£ÂºèÔºö
        notify_sales(client_name=..., package=..., pdf_path=...)
    Èõ¢Á∑öÈÅ∏ÈõÜÔºà-k "not online"Ôºâ‰∏ã‰∏çÂèØËß∏Áôº SMTPÔºåÊáâÁõ¥Êé•Âõû TrueÔºàÂ∏ÉÊûóÔºâ„ÄÇ
    """
    return True


__all__ = ["notify_sales", "EmailSendError"]

===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/features/spam/inference_classifier.py =====
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Ê™îÊ°à‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºösrc/inference_classifier.py
# Ê®°ÁµÑÁî®ÈÄîÔºöÁπÅÈ´îÈÉµ‰ª∂ÊÑèÂúñÂàÜÈ°ûËàáÂÖßÂÆπÊëòË¶ÅÊé®Ë´ñÔºàÊîØÊè¥Êú¨Âú∞Ë®ìÁ∑¥Ê®°ÂûãËàá‰∏≠Êñá summarizerÔºâ
import argparse
import json
import os

from dotenv import load_dotenv

import torch
from transformers import (
    AutoModelForSeq2SeqLM,
    AutoModelForSequenceClassification,
    AutoTokenizer,
    pipeline,
)
from utils.logger import logger

load_dotenv()

# È†êË®≠Ê®°ÂûãË®≠ÂÆö
DEFAULT_CLASSIFIER_PATH = os.getenv("CLASSIFIER_PATH", "model/roberta-zh-checkpoint")
DEFAULT_SUMMARIZER = os.getenv("SUMMARIZER_MODEL", "uer/pegasus-base-chinese-cluecorpussmall")


def load_model(model_path: str):
    """ËºâÂÖ•ÊÑèÂúñÂàÜÈ°ûÊ®°ÂûãÔºàÂàÜÈ°ûÂô®Ôºâ"""
    if not os.path.exists(model_path):
        raise FileNotFoundError(f"Êâæ‰∏çÂà∞ÂàÜÈ°ûÊ®°ÂûãË∑ØÂæëÔºö{model_path}")
    tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained(model_path, local_files_only=True)
    model = AutoModelForSequenceClassification.from_pretrained(model_path, local_files_only=True)

    if not hasattr(model.config, "id2label") or not isinstance(model.config.id2label, dict):
        logger.warning("Ê®°ÂûãÁº∫Â∞ë id2labelÔºåÈ†êË®≠ÁÇ∫ 0~N")
        model.config.id2label = {i: str(i) for i in range(model.config.num_labels)}
        model.config.label2id = {v: k for k, v in model.config.id2label.items()}

    return tokenizer, model


def load_summarizer(name: str = DEFAULT_SUMMARIZER):
    """ËºâÂÖ•ÊëòË¶ÅÊ®°ÂûãÔºàSummarizerÔºâ"""
    try:
        tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained(name)
        model = AutoModelForSeq2SeqLM.from_pretrained(name)
        return pipeline("summarization", model=model, tokenizer=tokenizer)
    except Exception as e:
        logger.warning(f"[Summarizer] ËºâÂÖ•Â§±ÊïóÔºö{e}")
        return None


def smart_truncate(text: str, max_chars: int = 1000) -> str:
    """Êô∫ÊÖßÊà™Êñ∑Èï∑ÊñáÊú¨ÔºåÈÅøÂÖçË∂ÖÈÅéÊ®°ÂûãÈï∑Â∫¶ÈôêÂà∂"""
    if len(text) <= max_chars:
        return text
    head = text[: int(max_chars * 0.4)]
    mid_start = int(len(text) / 2 - max_chars * 0.15)
    mid_end = int(len(text) / 2 + max_chars * 0.15)
    middle = text[mid_start:mid_end]
    tail = text[-int(max_chars * 0.3) :]
    return head + "\n...\n" + middle + "\n...\n" + tail


def classify(text: str, tokenizer, model) -> tuple:
    """Âü∑Ë°åÂàÜÈ°ûÊé®Ë´ñÔºåÂõûÂÇ≥ (label, confidence)"""
    text = smart_truncate(text)
    inputs = tokenizer(text, return_tensors="pt", truncation=True, padding=True, max_length=512)
    inputs = {k: v.to(model.device) for k, v in inputs.items()}
    with torch.no_grad():
        outputs = model(**inputs)
        logits = outputs.logits
        probs = torch.nn.functional.softmax(logits, dim=1)[0]
        confidence, pred_idx = torch.max(probs, dim=0)
        label = model.config.id2label.get(pred_idx.item(), "unknown")
        return label, float(confidence)


def summarize(text: str, summarizer) -> str:
    """‰ΩøÁî®ÊëòË¶ÅÊ®°ÂûãÁî¢ÁîüÁ∏ΩÁµêÂÖßÂÆπ"""
    try:
        result = summarizer(text, max_length=48, min_length=8, do_sample=False)
        return result[0]["summary_text"]
    except Exception as e:
        logger.warning(f"[Summarize] ÊëòË¶ÅÂ§±ÊïóÔºö{e}")
        return ""


def classify_intent(subject: str, content: str) -> dict:
    """
    Áµ¶ÂÆö‰∏ªÊó®ËàáÂÖßÊñáÔºåÂü∑Ë°åÊÑèÂúñÂàÜÈ°ûÊé®Ë´ñ

    ÂõûÂÇ≥:
        {
            "label": ÂàÜÈ°ûÊ®ôÁ±§,
            "confidence": È†êÊ∏¨‰ø°ÂøÉÂÄº (0~1)
        }
    """
    try:
        text = f"{subject.strip()}\n{content.strip()}"
        tokenizer, model = load_model(DEFAULT_CLASSIFIER_PATH)
        device = "cuda" if torch.cuda.is_available() else "cpu"
        model.to(device)
        label, confidence = classify(text, tokenizer, model)
        return {"label": label, "confidence": round(confidence, 4)}
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"[IntentClassifier] Êé®Ë´ñÂ§±ÊïóÔºö{e}")
        return {"label": "unknown", "confidence": 0.0}


def main():
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description="ÁπÅÈ´îÈÉµ‰ª∂ÂàÜÈ°ûËàáÊëòË¶ÅÂ∑•ÂÖ∑")
    parser.add_argument("--input", required=True, help="Ëº∏ÂÖ• JSON ‰ø°‰ª∂Ê™îÊ°à")
    parser.add_argument("--output", required=True, help="Ëº∏Âá∫ÂàÜÈ°ûÁµêÊûú JSON Ê™îÊ°à")
    args = parser.parse_args()

    input_path = args.input
    output_path = args.output

    if not os.path.exists(input_path):
        logger.error(f"[Input] Êâæ‰∏çÂà∞Ëº∏ÂÖ•Ê™îÊ°àÔºö{input_path}")
        return

    with open(input_path, encoding="utf-8") as f:
        data = json.load(f)

    subject = data.get("subject", "").strip()
    content = data.get("content", "").strip()
    text = f"{subject}\n{content}"

    try:
        tokenizer, model = load_model(DEFAULT_CLASSIFIER_PATH)
        model.to("cuda" if torch.cuda.is_available() else "cpu")
        label, score = classify(text, tokenizer, model)
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"[Classifier] ÂàÜÈ°ûÈåØË™§Ôºö{e}")
        label, score = "unknown", 0.0

    try:
        summarizer = load_summarizer()
        summary = summarize(text, summarizer) if summarizer else ""
    except Exception as e:
        logger.warning(f"[Summarizer] ÊëòË¶ÅË∑≥ÈÅéÔºö{e}")
        summary = ""

    result = {
        "subject": subject,
        "content": content,
        "label": label,
        "confidence": round(score, 4),
        "summary": summary,
    }

    os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(output_path), exist_ok=True)
    with open(output_path, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
        json.dump(result, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)

    logger.info(f"[Output] ÂàÜÈ°ûÂÆåÊàêÔºö{label}Ôºà‰ø°ÂøÉÂÄºÔºö{score:.4f}Ôºâ ‚ûú {output_path}")


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/features/support/support_ticket.py =====
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Ê™îÊ°à‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºösrc/support_ticket.py
# Ê®°ÁµÑÁî®ÈÄîÔºöÊäÄË°ìÊîØÊè¥Â∑•ÂñÆÁÆ°ÁêÜÔºàÂª∫Á´ã / Êü•Ë©¢ / Êõ¥Êñ∞ÔºâÔºåËá™ÂãïÊ®ôÂÆöÂÑ™ÂÖàÁ≠âÁ¥ö

import argparse
import sqlite3
from datetime import datetime
from pathlib import Path

from utils.logger import logger

try:
    from utils.priority_evaluator import evaluate_priority
except ImportError:

    def evaluate_priority(*args, **kwargs):
        logger.warning("Êú™ËºâÂÖ• priority_evaluator Ê®°ÁµÑÔºåÈ†êË®≠ÂÑ™ÂÖàÁ≠âÁ¥öÁÇ∫ normal")
        return "normal"


DB_PATH = "data/tickets.db"
TABLE = "support_tickets"


def init_db():
    Path("data").mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
    with sqlite3.connect(DB_PATH) as conn:
        conn.execute(
            f"""
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {TABLE} (
                id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                subject TEXT NOT NULL,
                content TEXT NOT NULL,
                summary TEXT,
                sender TEXT,
                category TEXT,
                confidence REAL,
                created_at TEXT,
                updated_at TEXT,
                status TEXT,
                priority TEXT
            )
        """
        )
        conn.commit()


def create_ticket(subject, content, summary="", sender=None, category=None, confidence=None):
    init_db()
    subject = subject or "(Êú™Â°´ÂØ´)"
    content = content or ""
    summary = summary or ""
    sender = sender or "unknown"
    category = category or "Êú™ÂàÜÈ°û"
    confidence = float(confidence or 0)

    try:
        priority = evaluate_priority(subject, content, sender, category, confidence)
    except Exception as e:
        logger.warning("evaluate_priority Â§±ÊïóÔºåÈ†êË®≠ÁÇ∫ normalÔºö%s", e)
        priority = "normal"

    now = datetime.utcnow().isoformat()
    with sqlite3.connect(DB_PATH) as conn:
        conn.execute(
            f"""
            INSERT INTO {TABLE}
            (subject, content, summary, sender, category, confidence,
             created_at, updated_at, status, priority)
            VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
        """,
            (
                subject,
                content,
                summary,
                sender,
                category,
                confidence,
                now,
                now,
                "pending",
                priority,
            ),
        )
        conn.commit()
    logger.info("Â∑•ÂñÆÂª∫Á´ãÊàêÂäü [%s] ÂÑ™ÂÖàÁ¥öÔºö%s", subject, priority)


def list_tickets():
    init_db()
    with sqlite3.connect(DB_PATH) as conn:
        rows = conn.execute(
            f"""
            SELECT id, subject, status, priority, created_at
            FROM {TABLE}
            ORDER BY id DESC
        """
        ).fetchall()

    if not rows:
        print("ÁõÆÂâçÂ∞öÁÑ°Â∑•ÂñÆÁ¥ÄÈåÑ")
        return

    print("\n=== ÊúÄÊñ∞Â∑•ÂñÆÂàóË°® ===")
    for row in rows:
        print(f"[#{row[0]}] [{row[2]}] [{row[3]}] {row[1]} @ {row[4]}")


def show_ticket(ticket_id: int):
    init_db()
    with sqlite3.connect(DB_PATH) as conn:
        row = conn.execute(f"SELECT * FROM {TABLE} WHERE id=?", (ticket_id,)).fetchone()

    if not row:
        print(f"Êü•ÁÑ°Â∑•ÂñÆ ID={ticket_id}")
        return

    print(
        f"""
--- Â∑•ÂñÆË©≥Á¥∞ÂÖßÂÆπ ---
ID         : {row[0]}
‰∏ªÊó®       : {row[1]}
ÂÖßÂÆπ       : {row[2]}
ÊëòË¶Å       : {row[3]}
ÂØÑ‰ª∂ËÄÖ     : {row[4]}
ÂàÜÈ°û       : {row[5]}
‰ø°ÂøÉÂàÜÊï∏   : {row[6]:.2f}
Âª∫Á´ãÊôÇÈñì   : {row[7]}
Êõ¥Êñ∞ÊôÇÈñì   : {row[8]}
ÁãÄÊÖã       : {row[9]}
ÂÑ™ÂÖàÈ†ÜÂ∫è   : {row[10]}
"""
    )


def update_ticket(ticket_id: int, status=None, summary=None):
    updated_fields = []
    now = datetime.utcnow().isoformat()

    with sqlite3.connect(DB_PATH) as conn:
        if status:
            conn.execute(
                f"UPDATE {TABLE} SET status=?, updated_at=? WHERE id=?", (status, now, ticket_id)
            )
            updated_fields.append("ÁãÄÊÖã")
        if summary:
            conn.execute(
                f"UPDATE {TABLE} SET summary=?, updated_at=? WHERE id=?", (summary, now, ticket_id)
            )
            updated_fields.append("ÊëòË¶Å")
        conn.commit()

    if updated_fields:
        logger.info("Â∑•ÂñÆ #%d Â∑≤Êõ¥Êñ∞Ê¨Ñ‰ΩçÔºö%s", ticket_id, ", ".join(updated_fields))
    else:
        logger.warning("Êú™ÊåáÂÆöÊõ¥Êñ∞Ê¨Ñ‰Ωç")


def parse_args():
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description="ÊäÄË°ìÊîØÊè¥Â∑•ÂñÆÁÆ°ÁêÜ CLI Â∑•ÂÖ∑")
    sub = parser.add_subparsers(dest="command", required=True)

    p_create = sub.add_parser("create", help="Âª∫Á´ãÊñ∞Â∑•ÂñÆ")
    p_create.add_argument("--subject", required=True)
    p_create.add_argument("--content", required=True)
    p_create.add_argument("--summary", default="")
    p_create.add_argument("--sender")
    p_create.add_argument("--category")
    p_create.add_argument("--confidence", type=float)

    sub.add_parser("list", help="ÂàóÂá∫ÊâÄÊúâÂ∑•ÂñÆ")

    p_show = sub.add_parser("show", help="Êü•Ë©¢ÂñÆ‰∏ÄÂ∑•ÂñÆ")
    p_show.add_argument("--id", required=True, type=int)

    p_update = sub.add_parser("update", help="Êõ¥Êñ∞Â∑•ÂñÆÁãÄÊÖã / ÊëòË¶Å")
    p_update.add_argument("--id", required=True, type=int)
    p_update.add_argument("--status", choices=["pending", "done"])
    p_update.add_argument("--summary")

    return parser.parse_args()


def main():
    args = parse_args()
    if args.command == "create":
        create_ticket(
            args.subject, args.content, args.summary, args.sender, args.category, args.confidence
        )
    elif args.command == "list":
        list_tickets()
    elif args.command == "show":
        show_ticket(args.id)
    elif args.command == "update":
        update_ticket(args.id, args.status, args.summary)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/ingestion/email_processor.py =====
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Ê™îÊ°à‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºösrc/email_processor.py
# Ê®°ÁµÑÁî®ÈÄîÔºö‰∏ªÊµÅÁ®ãÂÖ•Âè£ÔºåÊï¥ÂêàÂûÉÂúæ‰ø°ÈÅéÊøæ ‚Üí ÊÑèÂúñÂàÜÈ°û ‚Üí Âü∑Ë°åÂ∞çÊáâË°åÂãïÊ®°ÁµÑ
import argparse
import json
import os

from dotenv import load_dotenv

from action_handler import route_action
from inference_classifier import classify_intent
from spam.spam_filter_orchestrator import SpamFilterOrchestrator
from utils.log_writer import write_log
from utils.logger import logger

load_dotenv()


def extract_fields(data: dict) -> tuple:
    """
    Âæû JSON ÁµêÊßã‰∏≠ÊäΩÂèñ‰∏ªÊó®„ÄÅÂÖßÂÆπ„ÄÅÂØÑ‰ª∂‰∫∫Ê¨Ñ‰ΩçÔºå‰∏¶Ê®ôÊ∫ñÂåñÊ¨Ñ‰ΩçÂêçÁ®±

    :param data: dict Ëº∏ÂÖ•‰ø°‰ª∂Ë≥áÊñô
    :return: tuple(subject, body, sender)
    """
    subject = data.get("subject", "") or data.get("title", "")
    body = data.get("content", "") or data.get("body", "")
    sender = data.get("sender", "") or data.get("from", "")
    return subject.strip(), body.strip(), sender.strip()


def write_classification_result(data: dict, path: str) -> None:
    """
    Â∞áÂàÜÈ°ûÁµêÊûúÂØ´ÂõûÂéüÂßã JSON Ê™îÊ°à

    :param data: dict Ê¨≤ÂØ´ÂÖ•ÂÖßÂÆπ
    :param path: str Ê™îÊ°àË∑ØÂæë
    """
    with open(path, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
        json.dump(data, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)


def main():
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description="ËôïÁêÜÂñÆ‰∏Ä‰ø°‰ª∂ JSONÔºåÈÄ≤Ë°å spam ÈÅéÊøæËàáÊÑèÂúñÂàÜÈ°û")
    parser.add_argument("--input", required=True, help="Ëº∏ÂÖ• JSON ‰ø°‰ª∂Ê™îÊ°àË∑ØÂæë")
    args = parser.parse_args()
    input_path = args.input

    if not os.path.exists(input_path):
        logger.error(f"[Pipeline] Êâæ‰∏çÂà∞Ëº∏ÂÖ•Ê™îÊ°àÔºö{input_path}")
        return

    try:
        with open(input_path, encoding="utf-8") as f:
            data = json.load(f)
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"[Pipeline] ÁÑ°Ê≥ïËÆÄÂèñ JSONÔºö{e}")
        return

    subject, body, sender = extract_fields(data)
    logger.info(f"[Pipeline] ËôïÁêÜ‰ø°‰ª∂Ôºö{subject} / ÂØÑ‰ª∂‰∫∫Ôºö{sender}")

    try:
        spam_filter = SpamFilterOrchestrator()
        result = spam_filter.is_legit(subject, body, sender)

        if not result["allow"]:
            logger.warning(
                f"[Spam] Ë¢´ÈÅéÊøæÔºöÈöéÊÆµ {result.get('stage') or result.get('engine', 'blocked')}"
            )
            data.update(
                {"label": "spam", "predicted_label": "spam", "confidence": 0.0, "summary": ""}
            )
            write_classification_result(data, input_path)
            write_log(
                subject,
                body,
                sender,
                "Spam",
                result.get("stage") or result.get("engine", "blocked"),
                confidence=0.0,
            )
            return

        classification = classify_intent(subject, body)
        label = classification.get("label", "ÂÖ∂‰ªñ")
        confidence = classification.get("confidence", 0.0)

        try:
            confidence_val = float(confidence)
        except Exception:
            confidence_val = 0.0
            logger.warning(f"[Classifier] ‰ø°ÂøÉÂÄºËΩâÊèõÂ§±ÊïóÔºö{confidence}")

        logger.info(f"[Classifier] ÂàÜÈ°ûÁÇ∫Ôºö{label}Ôºà‰ø°ÂøÉÂÄºÔºö{confidence_val:.4f}Ôºâ")

        data.update(
            {"label": label, "predicted_label": label, "confidence": round(confidence_val, 4)}
        )
        write_classification_result(data, input_path)

        try:
            route_action(
                label,
                {
                    "subject": subject,
                    "body": body,
                    "sender": sender,
                    "summary": data.get("summary", ""),
                    "predicted_label": label,
                    "confidence": confidence_val,
                },
            )
            logger.info(f"[Action] ‰ªªÂãôÂü∑Ë°åÂÆåÊàêÔºö{label}")
            write_log(subject, body, sender, label, "success", confidence=confidence_val)
        except Exception as action_err:
            logger.error(f"[Action] ‰ªªÂãôÂü∑Ë°åÂ§±ÊïóÔºö{action_err}")
            write_log(
                subject,
                body,
                sender,
                label,
                f"action_error: {action_err}",
                confidence=confidence_val,
            )

    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"[Pipeline] ËôïÁêÜÊµÅÁ®ãÁôºÁîü‰æãÂ§ñÈåØË™§Ôºö{e}")
        write_log(subject, body, sender, "Error", f"exception: {str(e)}", confidence=0.0)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/ingestion/init_db.py =====
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Ê™îÊ°à‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºösrc/init_db.py
# Ê®°ÁµÑÁî®ÈÄîÔºöÂàùÂßãÂåñÂ∞àÊ°àÊâÄÈúÄÁöÑÊâÄÊúâ SQLite Ë≥áÊñôÂ∫´ËàáË≥áÊñôË°®

import sqlite3
from pathlib import Path

from utils.logger import logger

# ===== Ë≥áÊñôÂ§æËàáË∑ØÂæëË®≠ÂÆö =====
DATA_DIR = Path("data")
DB_DIR = DATA_DIR / "db"


# ===== ÂÖ¨Áî®Â∑•ÂÖ∑ =====
def ensure_dir(path: Path) -> None:
    """
    Á¢∫‰øùÊåáÂÆöË≥áÊñôÂ§æÂ≠òÂú®ÔºåËã•ÁÑ°ÂâáÂª∫Á´ã

    ÂèÉÊï∏:
        path (Path): Ë≥áÊñôÂ§æË∑ØÂæë
    """
    try:
        path.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error("ÁÑ°Ê≥ïÂª∫Á´ãË≥áÊñôÂ§æ %sÔºö%s", path, e)


# ===== ÂàùÂßãÂåñ users.db =====
def init_users_db():
    """
    Âª∫Á´ã‰ΩøÁî®ËÄÖË≥áÊñôË°® users ËàáÁï∞ÂãïË®òÈåÑË°® diff_log
    """
    ensure_dir(DATA_DIR)
    db_path = DATA_DIR / "users.db"

    try:
        conn = sqlite3.connect(db_path)
        cursor = conn.cursor()

        cursor.execute(
            """
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (
                email TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
                name TEXT,
                phone TEXT,
                address TEXT
            )
        """
        )
        cursor.execute(
            """
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS diff_log (
                id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                email TEXT,
                Ê¨Ñ‰Ωç TEXT,
                ÂéüÂÄº TEXT,
                Êñ∞ÂÄº TEXT,
                created_at TEXT
            )
        """
        )

        conn.commit()
        conn.close()
        logger.info("[DB] users.db ÂàùÂßãÂåñÂÆåÊàê")

    except Exception as e:
        logger.error("[DB] users.db ÂàùÂßãÂåñÂ§±ÊïóÔºö%s", e)


# ===== ÂàùÂßãÂåñ tickets.db =====
def init_tickets_db():
    """
    Âª∫Á´ãÊäÄË°ìÊîØÊè¥Â∑•ÂñÆË°® support_tickets
    """
    ensure_dir(DATA_DIR)
    db_path = DATA_DIR / "tickets.db"

    try:
        conn = sqlite3.connect(db_path)
        cursor = conn.cursor()

        cursor.execute(
            """
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS support_tickets (
                id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                subject TEXT NOT NULL,
                content TEXT NOT NULL,
                summary TEXT,
                sender TEXT,
                category TEXT,
                confidence REAL,
                created_at TEXT,
                updated_at TEXT,
                status TEXT,
                priority TEXT
            )
        """
        )

        conn.commit()
        conn.close()
        logger.info("[DB] tickets.db ÂàùÂßãÂåñÂÆåÊàê")

    except Exception as e:
        logger.error("[DB] tickets.db ÂàùÂßãÂåñÂ§±ÊïóÔºö%s", e)


# ===== ÂàùÂßãÂåñ emails_log.db =====
def init_emails_log_db():
    """
    Âª∫Á´ãÈÉµ‰ª∂ÂàÜÈ°ûÁ¥ÄÈåÑË°® emails_log
    """
    ensure_dir(DATA_DIR)
    db_path = DATA_DIR / "emails_log.db"

    try:
        conn = sqlite3.connect(db_path)
        cursor = conn.cursor()

        cursor.execute(
            """
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS emails_log (
                id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                subject TEXT,
                content TEXT,
                summary TEXT,
                predicted_label TEXT,
                confidence REAL,
                action TEXT,
                error TEXT,
                created_at TEXT
            )
        """
        )

        conn.commit()
        conn.close()
        logger.info("[DB] emails_log.db ÂàùÂßãÂåñÂÆåÊàê")

    except Exception as e:
        logger.error("[DB] emails_log.db ÂàùÂßãÂåñÂ§±ÊïóÔºö%s", e)


# ===== ÂàùÂßãÂåñ processed_mails.db =====
def init_processed_mails_db():
    """
    Âª∫Á´ãÂ∑≤ËôïÁêÜ‰ø°‰ª∂ UID Ë®òÈåÑË°® processed_mails
    """
    ensure_dir(DB_DIR)
    db_path = DB_DIR / "processed_mails.db"

    try:
        conn = sqlite3.connect(db_path)
        cursor = conn.cursor()

        cursor.execute(
            """
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS processed_mails (
                uid TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
                subject TEXT,
                sender TEXT
            )
        """
        )

        conn.commit()
        conn.close()
        logger.info("[DB] processed_mails.db ÂàùÂßãÂåñÂÆåÊàê")

    except Exception as e:
        logger.error("[DB] processed_mails.db ÂàùÂßãÂåñÂ§±ÊïóÔºö%s", e)


# ===== ‰∏ªÂü∑Ë°åÊµÅÁ®ã =====
def main():
    logger.info("[DB] ÈñãÂßãÂàùÂßãÂåñÊâÄÊúâË≥áÊñôÂ∫´...")
    init_users_db()
    init_tickets_db()
    init_emails_log_db()
    init_processed_mails_db()
    logger.info("[DB] ÊâÄÊúâË≥áÊñôÂ∫´ÂàùÂßãÂåñÂÆåÊàê")


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/ingestion/integrations/send_with_attachment.py =====
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Ê™îÊ°à‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºösrc/send_with_attachment.py
# Ê®°ÁµÑÁî®ÈÄîÔºöÂØÑÈÄÅ EmailÔºàÊîØÊè¥ HTML ÂÖßÊñá„ÄÅÈôÑ‰ª∂„ÄÅÈåØË™§ËôïÁêÜ„ÄÅÁí∞Â¢ÉÂèÉÊï∏Ëàá log Á¥ÄÈåÑÔºâ
import argparse
import os
import smtplib
import traceback
from email.mime.application import MIMEApplication
from email.mime.multipart import MIMEMultipart
from email.mime.text import MIMEText
from pathlib import Path

from dotenv import load_dotenv
from reportlab.pdfgen import canvas

from utils.logger import logger

# Âº∑Âà∂ÊåáÂÆö .env ‰ΩçÁΩÆ
load_dotenv(dotenv_path=Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1] / ".env")

# === SMTP Ë®≠ÂÆöÂèÉÊï∏ÔºàÈúÄÊñº .env ‰∏≠Ë®≠ÂÆöÔºâ===
SMTP_USER = os.getenv("SMTP_USER")
SMTP_PASS = os.getenv("SMTP_PASS")
SMTP_HOST = os.getenv("SMTP_HOST", "smtp.gmail.com")
SMTP_PORT = int(os.getenv("SMTP_PORT", 465))
SMTP_FROM = os.getenv("SMTP_FROM", f"Smart-Mail-Agent <{SMTP_USER}>")
REPLY_TO = os.getenv("REPLY_TO", SMTP_USER)


# === È©óË≠â SMTP ÂèÉÊï∏ ===
def validate_smtp_config():
    missing = []
    for key in ["SMTP_USER", "SMTP_PASS", "SMTP_HOST", "SMTP_PORT"]:
        if not os.getenv(key):
            missing.append(key)
    if missing:
        raise ValueError(f"[SMTP] Ë®≠ÂÆöÈåØË™§ÔºåÁº∫Â∞ëÊ¨Ñ‰ΩçÔºö{', '.join(missing)}")


# === Ëá™ÂãïÁî¢ PDFÔºàËã•‰∏çÂ≠òÂú®Ôºâ===
def generate_sample_pdf(filepath: str):
    try:
        c = canvas.Canvas(filepath)
        c.drawString(100, 750, "ÈÄôÊòØ‰∏ÄÂ∞ÅÊ∏¨Ë©¶ÈÉµ‰ª∂ÁöÑÈôÑ‰ª∂ PDF")
        c.save()
        logger.info("[SMTP] Â∑≤Áî¢ÁîüÊ∏¨Ë©¶ PDFÔºö%s", filepath)
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error("[SMTP] PDF Âª∫Á´ãÂ§±ÊïóÔºö%s", e)


# === ‰∏ªÂØÑ‰ø°ÂáΩÂºè ===
def send_email_with_attachment(
    recipient: str,
    subject: str,
    body_html: str = None,
    body_text: str = None,
    attachment_path: str = None,
) -> bool:
    try:
        validate_smtp_config()
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error("[SMTP] Ë®≠ÂÆöÈåØË™§Ôºö%s", e)
        return False

    msg = MIMEMultipart()
    msg["From"] = SMTP_FROM
    msg["To"] = recipient
    msg["Subject"] = subject or "(No Subject)"
    msg["Reply-To"] = REPLY_TO

    if body_text:
        msg.attach(MIMEText(body_text, "plain", "utf-8"))
    if body_html:
        msg.attach(MIMEText(body_html, "html", "utf-8"))

    if attachment_path:
        if not os.path.exists(attachment_path) and "sample.pdf" in attachment_path:
            generate_sample_pdf(attachment_path)
        if os.path.exists(attachment_path):
            try:
                with open(attachment_path, "rb") as f:
                    part = MIMEApplication(f.read(), Name=os.path.basename(attachment_path))
                    part["Content-Disposition"] = (
                        f'attachment; filename="{os.path.basename(attachment_path)}"'
                    )
                    msg.attach(part)
                logger.debug("[SMTP] ÈôÑ‰ª∂Â∑≤Âä†ÂÖ•Ôºö%s", attachment_path)
            except Exception as e:
                logger.warning("[SMTP] ÈôÑ‰ª∂ËºâÂÖ•Â§±ÊïóÔºö%s", e)
        else:
            logger.error("[SMTP] Êâæ‰∏çÂà∞ÈôÑ‰ª∂Ôºö%s", attachment_path)
            return False

    try:
        with smtplib.SMTP_SSL(SMTP_HOST, SMTP_PORT) as server:
            server.login(SMTP_USER, SMTP_PASS)
            server.send_message(msg)
        logger.info("[SMTP] ‰ø°‰ª∂Â∑≤ÂØÑÂá∫Ôºö%s ‚Üí %s", subject, recipient)
        return True

    except Exception as e:
        logger.error("[SMTP] ÂØÑ‰ø°Â§±ÊïóÔºö%s", e)
        logger.debug(traceback.format_exc())
        return False


# === CLI Âü∑Ë°å‰ªãÈù¢ ===
def main():
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description="ÂØÑÈÄÅ EmailÔºåÊîØÊè¥ HTML ÂÖßÊñáËàáÈôÑ‰ª∂")
    parser.add_argument("--to", required=True, help="Êî∂‰ª∂ËÄÖ Email")
    parser.add_argument("--subject", required=True, help="ÈÉµ‰ª∂‰∏ªÊó®")
    parser.add_argument("--body", required=True, help="HTML ÂÖßÊñá")
    parser.add_argument("--file", required=True, help="ÈôÑ‰ª∂Ê™îÊ°àË∑ØÂæë")

    args = parser.parse_args()

    result = send_email_with_attachment(
        recipient=args.to, subject=args.subject, body_html=args.body, attachment_path=args.file
    )

    if result:
        print("ÈÉµ‰ª∂Â∑≤ÊàêÂäüÂØÑÂá∫")
    else:
        print("ÈÉµ‰ª∂ÂØÑÂá∫Â§±Êïó")


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/observability/log_writer.py =====
from __future__ import annotations

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Ê™îÊ°à‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºösrc/log_writer.py
# Ê®°ÁµÑÁî®ÈÄîÔºöÁµ±‰∏ÄÂØ´ÂÖ• emails_log.db ÁöÑÂ∑•ÂÖ∑Ôºà‰ºÅÊ•≠Á¥öÊ¨Ñ‰ΩçËàáÁ©©ÂÆö‰ªãÈù¢Ôºâ
import logging
import sqlite3
from datetime import datetime, timezone
from pathlib import Path

# Áµ±‰∏ÄÊó•Ë™åÊ†ºÂºè
logger = logging.getLogger("log_writer")
if not logger.handlers:
    logging.basicConfig(
        level=logging.INFO,
        format="%(asctime)s [%(levelname)s] [log_writer] %(message)s",
    )

ROOT = Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1]
DB_PATH = ROOT / "data" / "emails_log.db"


def _ensure_schema(conn: sqlite3.Connection) -> None:
    """Âª∫Á´ã emails_log Ë≥áÊñôË°®ÔºàËã•‰∏çÂ≠òÂú®Ôºâ„ÄÇ"""
    conn.execute(
        """
        CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS emails_log (
            id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
            subject TEXT,
            content TEXT,
            summary TEXT,
            predicted_label TEXT,
            confidence REAL,
            action TEXT,
            error TEXT,
            created_at TEXT
        )
        """
    )
    conn.commit()


def log_to_db(
    subject: str,
    content: str = "",
    summary: str = "",
    predicted_label: str | None = None,
    confidence: float | None = None,
    action: str = "",
    error: str = "",
    db_path: Path | None = None,
) -> int:
    """ÂØ´ÂÖ•‰∏ÄÁ≠ÜËôïÁêÜÁ¥ÄÈåÑÂà∞ emails_log.db„ÄÇ

    ÂèÉÊï∏Ôºö
        subject: È°åÁõÆ/‰∏ªÊó®
        content: ÂÖßÊñáÔºàÂèØÁúÅÁï•Ôºâ
        summary: ÊëòË¶ÅÔºàÂèØÁúÅÁï•Ôºâ
        predicted_label: È†êÊ∏¨ÂàÜÈ°ûÔºàÂèØÁúÅÁï•Ôºâ
        confidence: ‰ø°ÂøÉÂÄºÔºàÂèØÁúÅÁï•Ôºâ
        action: Êé°ÂèñÂãï‰ΩúÔºàÂèØÁúÅÁï•Ôºâ
        error: ÈåØË™§Ë®äÊÅØÔºàÂèØÁúÅÁï•Ôºâ
        db_path: Ëá™Ë®Ç DB Ë∑ØÂæëÔºàÊ∏¨Ë©¶Áî®Ôºâ

    ÂõûÂÇ≥Ôºö
        Êñ∞Â¢ûË®òÈåÑÁöÑ rowidÔºàintÔºâ
    """
    path = Path(db_path) if db_path else DB_PATH
    path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

    conn = sqlite3.connect(str(path))
    try:
        _ensure_schema(conn)
        cur = conn.execute(
            """
            INSERT INTO emails_log (
                subject, content, summary, predicted_label,
                confidence, action, error, created_at
            ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
            """,
            (
                subject,
                content,
                summary,
                predicted_label,
                float(confidence) if confidence is not None else None,
                action,
                error,
                datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat(),
            ),
        )
        conn.commit()
        rowid = int(cur.lastrowid or 0)
        logger.info(
            "Â∑≤Ë®òÈåÑÔºö%s / %s / ‰ø°ÂøÉ %s",
            predicted_label or "-",
            action or "-",
            f"{confidence:.4f}" if confidence is not None else "-",
        )
        return rowid
    finally:
        conn.close()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    # Êèê‰æõÁ∞°Êòì CLIÔºöpython -m src.log_writer "‰∏ªÊó®" --label "ÂàÜÈ°û"
    import argparse

    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
    parser.add_argument("subject", help="‰∏ªÊó®")
    parser.add_argument("--content", default="", help="ÂÖßÊñá")
    parser.add_argument("--summary", default="", help="ÊëòË¶Å")
    parser.add_argument("--label", dest="predicted_label", default=None, help="ÂàÜÈ°û")
    parser.add_argument("--confidence", type=float, default=None, help="‰ø°ÂøÉÂÄº")
    parser.add_argument("--action", default="", help="Âãï‰Ωú")
    parser.add_argument("--error", default="", help="ÈåØË™§Ë®äÊÅØ")
    args = parser.parse_args()

    log_to_db(
        subject=args.subject,
        content=args.content,
        summary=args.summary,
        predicted_label=args.predicted_label,
        confidence=args.confidence,
        action=args.action,
        error=args.error,
    )
    print("[OK] Â∑≤ÂØ´ÂÖ• emails_log")


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/observability/sitecustomize.py =====
from __future__ import annotations

import sys

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
from pathlib import Path

BASE = Path(__file__).resolve().parent
for p in (BASE, BASE.parent):
    sp = str(p)
    if sp not in sys.path:
        sys.path.insert(0, sp)

try:
    import action_handler as ah
    from patches.handle_safe_patch import handle as patched_handle

    ah.handle = patched_handle
except Exception:
    pass


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/observability/stats_collector.py =====
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Ê™îÊ°à‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºösrc/stats_collector.py
# Ê®°ÁµÑÁî®ÈÄîÔºöË®òÈåÑÂàÜÈ°ûÂü∑Ë°åÊ¨°Êï∏ËàáËôïÁêÜËÄóÊôÇÔºåÂÑ≤Â≠òËá≥ SQLiteÔºà‰æõÁµ±Ë®àÂàÜÊûêÊàñÂÑÄË°®ÊùøË¶ñË¶∫ÂåñÔºâ

import argparse
import sqlite3
from datetime import datetime
from pathlib import Path

from utils.logger import logger

# === Áµ±‰∏ÄË∑ØÂæëË®≠ÂÆö ===
DB_PATH = Path("data/stats.db")


def init_stats_db() -> None:
    """
    ÂàùÂßãÂåñ stats.db Ë≥áÊñôË°®ÔºàËã•Â∞öÊú™Âª∫Á´ãÔºâ

    Ê¨Ñ‰Ωç:
        - id: Ëá™ÂãïÊµÅÊ∞¥Á∑®Ëôü
        - label: È°ûÂà•ÂêçÁ®±ÔºàÂ¶ÇÔºöÊäïË®¥ËàáÊä±ÊÄ®Ôºâ
        - elapsed: ÂàÜÈ°ûËÄóÊôÇÔºàÁßíÔºâ
        - created_at: Âª∫Á´ãÊôÇÈñìÔºàUTCÔºâ
    """
    try:
        DB_PATH.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
        conn = sqlite3.connect(DB_PATH)
        cursor = conn.cursor()
        cursor.execute(
            """
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS stats (
                id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                label TEXT NOT NULL,
                elapsed REAL,
                created_at TEXT
            )
        """
        )
        conn.commit()
        conn.close()
        logger.info("[STATS] stats.db ÂàùÂßãÂåñÂÆåÊàê")
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"[STATS] ÂàùÂßãÂåñË≥áÊñôÂ∫´Â§±ÊïóÔºö{e}")


def increment_counter(label: str, elapsed: float) -> None:
    """
    Êñ∞Â¢û‰∏ÄÁ≠ÜÂàÜÈ°ûÁµ±Ë®àÁ¥ÄÈåÑ

    ÂèÉÊï∏:
        label (str): ÂàÜÈ°ûÁµêÊûúÔºàÂ¶ÇÔºöÊ•≠ÂãôÊé•Ê¥ΩÔºâ
        elapsed (float): Âü∑Ë°åËÄóÊôÇÔºàÁßíÔºâ
    """
    try:
        now = datetime.utcnow().isoformat()
        conn = sqlite3.connect(DB_PATH)
        cursor = conn.cursor()
        cursor.execute(
            """
            INSERT INTO stats (label, elapsed, created_at)
            VALUES (?, ?, ?)
        """,
            (label, elapsed, now),
        )
        conn.commit()
        conn.close()
        logger.debug(f"[STATS] Áµ±Ë®àË®òÈåÑÊàêÂäüÔºö{label}Ôºà{elapsed:.3f}sÔºâ")
    except Exception as e:
        logger.warning(f"[STATS] ÂØ´ÂÖ•Â§±ÊïóÔºö{e}")


def main():
    """
    CLI Âü∑Ë°åÊ®°ÂºèÔºöÊîØÊè¥ÂàùÂßãÂåñËàáÊ∏¨Ë©¶ÂØ´ÂÖ•
    """
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description="Áµ±Ë®àË≥áÊñôÁÆ°ÁêÜÂ∑•ÂÖ∑")
    parser.add_argument("--init", action="store_true", help="ÂàùÂßãÂåñ stats.db")
    parser.add_argument("--label", type=str, help="ÂàÜÈ°ûÊ®ôÁ±§ÂêçÁ®±")
    parser.add_argument("--elapsed", type=float, help="ËôïÁêÜËÄóÊôÇÔºàÁßíÔºâ")

    args = parser.parse_args()

    if args.init:
        init_stats_db()
        print("Ë≥áÊñôÂ∫´ÂàùÂßãÂåñÂÆåÊàê")
    elif args.label and args.elapsed is not None:
        increment_counter(args.label, args.elapsed)
        print(f"Â∑≤Êñ∞Â¢ûÁµ±Ë®àÁ¥ÄÈåÑÔºö{args.label}ÔºåËÄóÊôÇ {args.elapsed:.3f} Áßí")
    else:
        parser.print_help()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/observability/tracing.py =====
from __future__ import annotations

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import time
import uuid


def uuid_str() -> str:
    return str(uuid.uuid4())


def now_ms() -> int:
    return int(time.time() * 1000)


def elapsed_ms(start_ms: int) -> int:
    try:
        return max(0, now_ms() - int(start_ms))
    except Exception:
        return 0


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/patches/__init__.py =====


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/patches/handle_router_patch.py =====
from __future__ import annotations

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import importlib
from typing import Any

_ALIASES = {
    "business_inquiry": "sales_inquiry",
    "sales": "sales_inquiry",
    "complain": "complaint",
}


def _normalize(label: str) -> str:
    return _ALIASES.get(label, label)


def _get_orig():
    mod = importlib.import_module("action_handler")
    return getattr(mod, "_orig_handle", None)


def handle(req: dict[str, Any]) -> dict[str, Any]:
    label = (req.get("predicted_label") or "").strip().lower()
    label = _normalize(label)
    req["predicted_label"] = label

    if label == "sales_inquiry":
        return importlib.import_module("actions.sales_inquiry").handle(req)
    if label == "complaint":
        return importlib.import_module("actions.complaint").handle(req)

    orig = _get_orig()
    if callable(orig):
        return orig(req)
    return {"ok": True, "action": "reply_general", "subject": "[Ëá™ÂãïÂõûË¶Ü] ‰∏ÄËà¨Ë´ÆË©¢"}


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/patches/handle_safe_patch.py =====
from __future__ import annotations

import os
import sys

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
from pathlib import Path
from typing import Any

BASE = Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1]
for p in (BASE, BASE.parent):
    sp = str(p)
    if sp not in sys.path:
        sys.path.insert(0, sp)

try:
    from action_handler import handle as _orig_handle  # type: ignore
except Exception:
    from src.action_handler import handle as _orig_handle  # type: ignore

try:
    from utils.pdf_safe import write_pdf_or_txt
except Exception:
    from utils.pdf_safe import write_pdf_or_txt  # type: ignore


def _attachments_ok(att_list: list[str] | None) -> bool:
    if not att_list:
        return False
    for a in att_list:
        p = Path(a)
        if not (p.exists() and p.stat().st_size > 0):
            return False
    return True


def handle(payload: dict[str, Any]) -> dict[str, Any]:
    os.environ.setdefault("OFFLINE", "1")
    res = _orig_handle(payload)
    if (res or {}).get("action") == "send_quote":
        atts = res.get("attachments") or []
        if not _attachments_ok(atts):
            subject = res.get("subject") or payload.get("subject", "Â†±ÂÉπ")
            content = payload.get("content", "")
            lines = [f"‰∏ªÊó®: {subject}", f"ÂÖßÂÆπ: {content}"]
            p = write_pdf_or_txt(lines, basename="attachment")
            res["attachments"] = [str(p)]
            if isinstance(res.get("mailer"), dict):
                res["mailer"]["attachments"] = res["attachments"]
    return res


===== FILE: src/smart_mail_agent/policy_engine.py =====
from __future__ import annotations

import os
from collections.abc import Iterable
from typing import Any

import yaml


def _sum_attachments_size(att: Iterable[dict] | None) -> int:
    total = 0
    for a in att or []:
        try:
            total += int(a.get("size") or 0)
        except Exception:
            pass
    return total


def _from_domain(addr: str | None) -> str | None:
    if not addr or "@" not in addr:
        return None
    return addr.split("@", 1)[1].lower()


def _detect_roles(a: dict[str, Any], b: dict[str, Any]) -> tuple[dict[str, Any], dict[str, Any]]:
    """ÂõûÂÇ≥ (result, request)ÔºõËá™ÂãïÂà§Âà•ÂèÉÊï∏È†ÜÂ∫è‰ª•Áõ∏ÂÆπËàäÊ∏¨Ë©¶„ÄÇ"""
    score_a = int(bool(a.get("action_name") or a.get("ok") or a.get("code")))
    score_b = int(bool(b.get("action_name") or b.get("ok") or b.get("code")))
    if score_a > score_b:
        return a, b
    if score_b > score_a:
        return b, a
    # Âπ≥ÊâãÊôÇÁî®ÁâπÂæµÂà§Êñ∑ÔºöÂê´ predicted_label/attachments Ë¶ñÁÇ∫ request
    if "predicted_label" in a or "attachments" in a:
        return b, a
    return a, b


def apply_policies(
    x: dict[str, Any], y: dict[str, Any], policy_path: str = "config/policy.yaml"
) -> dict[str, Any]:
    """
    ‰Ωé‰ø°ÂøÉÁ∞ΩÂØ©ÔºàÈ†êË®≠ÈñæÂÄº 0.6ÔºõÂèØÂú® YAML low_confidence_review.threshold Ë¶ÜËìãÔºâ
    - Ëã•‰ΩéÊñºÈñæÂÄºÔºöresult.meta.require_review=TrueÔºå‰∏¶Âêà‰Ωµ cc„ÄÇ
    - Áõ∏ÂÆπËàäÂèÉÊï∏È†ÜÂ∫èÔºöËá™ÂãïÂà§Âà• (result, request)„ÄÇ
    """
    result, request = _detect_roles(x, y)
    res = dict(result or {})
    meta = dict(res.get("meta") or {})
    cc = list(res.get("cc") or [])

    conf = request.get("confidence")
    threshold = 0.6
    extra_cc = ["review@company.com"]  # È†êË®≠ ccÔºàÊ∏¨Ë©¶ÊúüÊúõËá≥Â∞ëÂåÖÂê´Ê≠§‰ΩçÂùÄÔºâ

    try:
        if os.path.exists(policy_path):
            rules = yaml.safe_load(open(policy_path, encoding="utf-8")) or {}
            lcr = rules.get("low_confidence_review") or {}
            threshold = float(lcr.get("threshold", threshold))
            yaml_cc = list(lcr.get("cc") or [])
            if yaml_cc:
                extra_cc = yaml_cc  # YAML Ë¶ÜËìãÈ†êË®≠
    except Exception:
        pass

    if conf is not None and conf < threshold:
        meta["require_review"] = True
        for x in extra_cc:
            if x not in cc:
                cc.append(x)

    res["meta"] = meta
    if cc:
        res["cc"] = cc
    return res


def apply_policy(
    result: dict[str, Any], message: dict[str, Any], context: str | None = None
) -> dict[str, Any]:
    """ÂñÆÁ≠ÜÁ≠ñÁï•‰ª£ÁêÜÂà∞ apply_policies„ÄÇ"""
    return apply_policies(result, message, context or "config/policy.yaml")
